review_text: This is probably my favorite airbnb I have ever stayed in. It is in a super quiet neighborhood with the river right in the back yard. You have access to a whole patio and grill. the Kitchen and Bathroom were stocked with everything you could possibly need.

This is my 2nd time staying here and it has become a favorite of mine! I love how peaceful, quiet and private it is. The room has everything and so easy to gain access to it. The owners are so friendly and greeted me when I arrived.
I’m looking forward to the next time!

Absolutely great stay. Deserves the top ratings:
1. Super clean
2. Friendly host — gave us tour of the property
3. Great space
4. Lots of helpful small touches
5. Beautiful property on the river
6. Super value
Nice place to stay and lots to do in the area.

The perfect AirBnb -- clean, quiet, fully equipped, overlooking a rapid river that lulls you to sleep. And more important, the perfect AirBnb hosts: Friendly enough to invite you to dinner with friends and even go out for a night on the town (where the host himself took over the microphone and played a few tunes).
I'll be back.
Nice and peaceful location with very friendly hosts!
I'm a repeat guest with Tom because this is such a great value. It's always sparkling clean, quiet, and comfortable, and it's a beautiful location. Highly recommended!

Clean, comfortable and secluded.
Well appointed: hardwood floors, tile, granite countertops, etc. One of the nicest Airbnbs I have visited!
Tom and his wife were very friendly, greeted me and showed me around.
Tom and Carol are incredible hosts! So kind and hospitable. Such a beautiful oasis and escape. Only regret is not staying longer.

Carol was weeding and greeted me when I arrived. The place was beautiful, quiet and comfortable. I felt at home. Carol gave me fabulous suggestions for where to walk and where to eat. I will definitely rebook when I'm back in Hood River.
Beautiful place and great hosts. They went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed. Can’t wait to go back!

I was just looking for a safe, comfortable place to stay while out of town for work. Tom & Carols place was the Best Airbnb I have stayed in so far!! I felt very blessed to have the opportunity to stay in their home, I did not want to leave.. It was also a blessing to get the chance to get to know them.

Tom’s place is very cozy and nicely decorated. It is comfortable and clean. The place sits right above the river and it is a beautiful view. We had great recommendations from them for where to eat and what to do. The restaurant they suggested was very good. The town is a short drive and nice to walk around. We were skiing at Mount Hood Meadows and it was only a short drive from their place. They were super friendly and communicative. We would happily stay here again.
Relaxing location along the Hood River, about 10 minutes north of the town. Comfortable accommodations, very pleasant host!

I had a short but great stay; the hosts are lovely and the place is very quaint, clean and equipped with everything you need. Perfect location too!
I will definitely be back!

Tom and Carol are the most wholesome hosts I've had the pleasure of staying with! The accommodations were incredibly thoughtful, and you could tell that they took feedback from their guests seriously. As a solo traveler, the room had all the amenities I could need, including supplies for bubble baths! Definitely will be booking with them again when I return to Hood River.
This place is really nice. Very clean and comfortable beds. I would definitely come back. Tom was very friendly as well.
Great home away from home, will recommend it, great host.
Very comfortable and quiet space with a beautiful view of the river. Tom was very accommodating.
A gem of a place in close proximity to nature ! Enjoyed our stay and would definitely visit again !
I’m a repeat guest at this wonderful location. It’s quiet, comfortable, peaceful, squeaky clean, and a great value.

Great spot just a quick drive into downtown Hood River! Peaceful, spotless, and so well-thought out with everything you’ll need. Tom and Carol are fantastic, friendly hosts and I felt welcome and comfortable in their home.
Tom and Carol were more than helpful during check in and amazing hosts across the board! Such a peaceful property on the Hood River. Already planning my next trip back
great place
awesome as always
We enjoyed our stay so much! Hope to stay again and explore the town in the future.
It was a really beautiful and peaceful place. Hosts were really nice and helpful, made us feel at home.
The place was awesome...Tom & Carol couldn't be any nicer!

We enjoyed the beautiful surroundings and peaceful setting!!!
We hope to return sometime when the weather is warm & dry!!
A great space - very clean and peaceful. The host was very friendly and helpful

This is a five star accommodation with the added bonus of terrific hosts and a standout location along the Hood River. Our hosts were incredibly friendly and warm, and they even gave us some apples from their nearby orchard. Highly recommend.
I’ve stayed here twice and I love staying here! Tom and Carol are wonderful hosts and the space is quiet and calm. I’ll be back anytime I need to stay in the area.

Being able to stay here on the eve of my birthday, I’m turning 36 was truly the most relaxing entry of releasing chaos from my last year and just being like from here on out let it be so peaceful, like staying on this house on the hood river… It was truly a gift I feel like God just totally put it right in my lap, and it was amazing! Hope to stay there again!
Beautiful home and tranquil location. Great value for the price. I appreciated the private tour and welcoming upon arrival. Thanks
Great location and they are wonderful owners! It’s a very lovey place to stay. Comfortable and amazing

A truly wonderful Airbnb experience with two of the nicest and most welcoming hosts I’ve ever met.
Tom and Carol greeted me right when I walked through the door & made me feel at home immediately. They are warm, welcoming, friendly, and made great conversation. I stayed here for a WFR course I was taking at the Mount Hood Town Hall. It was the perfect location between there & Hood River itself.
The suite is sparkling clean and perfectly cozy. I couldn’t have asked for a better place to come back to after spending all day fixing pretend broken bones in the cold. The bed is SUPER comfortable & I slept better than I do at home. The whole place is just so cozy, calming, and warm.
Thank you, Tom & Carol, for making my stay so wonderful. I hope to be back soon. Highly recommend this Airbnb. 15/10 ⭐️
Such a cosy little spot in Hood River with beautiful surroundings and friendly, welcoming hosts.

Wonderful place to stay! Tom and Carol were friendly & relaxed hosts, and the little apartment suite was cozy, comfortable & clean. Lovely spot overlooking Hood River. Tom invited us to pick some of the delicious apples from the trees on his property! Easy drive to town and wineries.
This place is beautiful and bucolic. It is right on the Hood River and close to an adorable country store.
Very spacious and clean place. We enjoyed our one night quick stay very much. It is a wonderful place to stay for visiting Columbia River Gorges and surrounding area. Highly recommend.

WOW!! Loved this Airbnb in Hood River. The guest suite is amazing. Extremely clean, private, comfy bed, very spacious, loved the Kurig and drink selection. The river is right outside your door with a cozy covered patio. Tom and Carol are wonderful hosts who take great pride in the beautiful home they built. We enjoyed seeing their garden and appreciated the apples and pears they picked for us. The restaurants they recommended were all so good. We are already looking forward to our next stay!
Very nice & comfy room… they were there to greet me and make sure I was comfortable. Made me feel right at home. I will definitely be staying again on my next trip to the area!

Two of the kindest Airbnb hosts I have come across. The place is really beautiful, plenty private for being a suite inside the house, and comfortable. The Hood River in the back yard is lovely. They also gave us good recommendations, including Bette's Diner for a great breakfast. My highest recommendation and I hope we can stay with them again someday!
Great little spot in hood river!
The house is absolutely gorgeous and right on the Hood River! The apartment was private and very clean. The bathroom was super nice. We would definitely stay here again!
Had such a lovely stay! We really enjoyed this peaceful area and beautiful view of the river. Tom was a very friendly and helpful host! Would definitely come stay here again.

this was an absolutely beautiful place, both inside and out. the outdoor patio was a lovely place to rest and read while listening to the peaceful sounds of the Hood River running just behind the property. inside was clean, comfortable, and spacious. I felt right at home and slept very well. the hosts were very welcoming and fun to talk to! the kitchen was great for making coffee and reheating leftovers and enjoying a peaceful morning. the Internet was good for a bit of remote work before I started my day. this place would also be good and fun for a small family to stay because of a cute children's bedroom camping-cabin style. I can't wait to come back next time I'm staying in the area.

Tom & Carol's place was a beautiful place to stay for the night. we enjoyed having a glass of wine on the patio overlooking the river. They definitely put a lot of attention to detail into the place as well. Loved the kcups that not only had coffee, but hot chocolate and tea as well. The towels were oversized which was really nice and everything was extremely clean. Very quiet and peaceful. Was neat to see the "kids area" which was a couple beds off the kitchen in a "hidden closet". Price point was awesome for what you get at this place. If you are on the fence about renting this place, just do it. Pictures don't do it justice for the ambiance and homey feeling you get here. We would definitely stay here again!

Tom and Carol are gracious and welcoming hosts. We enjoyed their lovely Airbnb and relaxing on the patio which is located by the river. It's an easy drive into Hood River or to wineries, orchards, distilleries on the Mt Hood Fruit Loop. The space is very comfortable and well-equipped. We'd highly recommend a stay with Tom & Carol!
Very nice place! Pictures don't show how great it is. Hosts were very kind, friendly and helpful. I'd stay again if the opportunity presents itself.
Tom and Carol are terrific hosts; couldn’t ask for a better accommodation. We look forward to staying with them again!

Our stay with Tom and Carol made our one night in Hood River a truly memorable experience. Tom was. quick to respond to messaging, and Carol greeted us when we arrived and made us feel right at home.
Their local recommendations were perfect. Tom, thank you for sharing your talent (Hallelujah), and thank you both for the wonderful conversation. We will be back.

Tom and Carol are great hosts, very genuine and friendly, even picked us some apples and pears. The grounds are fun and beautiful, as well. Their attention to detail goes above and beyond. They are there if you need them, but really unobtrusive and allowed us much privacy. The house is a beautiful setting, and the apartment is clean, comfortable, and has everything you might need and all that was promised. Very comfortable in the 90 degree heat. Tom and Carol were very gracious about seeing that anything else needed was provided. Being able to start the day with the sound of the river and sitting outside near it was perfect. The house location is near to the town of Hood River, White Salmon, etc, but the location makes you feel miles away from civilization.

Tom and Carol's place is comfortable and quiet. Located right on the actual Hood River with a spacious outdoor living area, this space is perfect for hanging out with friends or just relaxing. Tom and Carol are very friendly hosts and allowed us to explore their private orchard and try some delicious fresh fruit.
The indoor space is cozy and clean, and the bed is comfortable.
Don't forget to stop at the Apple Valley Country Store just down the road for a huckleberry milkshake.
Great place right on the Sandy river. Very quiet and peaceful, but not too far from Hood River.
They spent a lot of time fixing up, very comfortable, love seeing the river, so peaceful.

The place was pristine and comfy. There are many amenities in the kitchen and in the bathroom. The hosts were extremely friendly and gave great local recommendations for hikes! The hosts were also very helpful as they showed us how to use appliances in the room. The place is just a short drive from stores and the Walmart, as well as restaurants and local gems. It is also close to Mt Hood. It was quiet, peaceful, and relaxing. We enjoyed our stay and would come back again!

Tom’s place was a perfect getaway. The river is so beautiful and serene, and he was so friendly! Also, Tom has great suggestions for local stuff (Bette’s Place for breakfast!). I’ll definitely be back.
One of my favorite Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed in! The hosts were so nice and welcoming, and I could have sat in those chairs listening to the river all evening. Thank you for the great stay!
Suited us perfectly. Beautiful riverside place. And, we’ve never stayed in a cleaner place!
Beautifully designed and laid-out suite. Tom & Carol were very welcoming and the place was comfortably stocked. They were accommodating with our late check-in time. Great value!!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. It was even better than we expected! We want to return someday when back in Oregon.

Tom and Carol provided the best experience. Their home is beautiful and comfortable, and they are friendly, helpful, and welcoming. We definitely want to return someday!! It is clear that they enjoy hosting by their efforts to make our stay the best possible experience; they have thought of every detail!

Just a beautiful location near Hood River and in the middle of the Fruit Loop. The sound of the river made it really peaceful and Tom was great as a resource for everything in the area. Great getaway. We were here for a wedding and couldn’t have picked a better spot to stay.

Tom and Carol are excellent hosts. They showed us around the apartment to make sure we understood how to operate everything. The apartment is well appointed. They invited us to sit by the river and use the grill if we wanted. The bed was comfortable. The towels are large and soft. The kitchen has a microwave oven, refrigerator and a nice coffee maker. Tea, coffee, salt and pepper are in the kitchen.

This was one of our best Airbnb’s to date. The attention to detail that Tom has used putting this studio together is incredible. They have not forgotten any detail. Everything is there that you would need. We were greeted at arrival by Carol and Tom making us feel right at home. Conversations with both of them were excellent and we look forward to having a lasting friendship. If you were looking to stay in the hood river area, look no further for 12 or even maybe a couple of kids included. This is the place for you. There are abundance of fruit trees on the property, there is a fruit stand at the end of the road, there’s a river that runs right behind the house that is very relaxing. We can’t wait to come back and spend some more time in this area and time with Tom and Carol. What a great day didn’t want to leave.

we stayed just one night for a wedding at mt hood organic farms and immediately said to each other that we have to return again soon to do a long weekend in hood river.
tom and carol are two of the nicest most hospitable and personable airbnb hosts we've ever encountered. even though we were barely there they made us feel so welcome and i could tell that if we'd been visiting for longer they wouldve been so helpful with tips on how to best enjoy the area.
even though the kitchen doesnt have a cooktop the grill under the cozy covered patio would make staying for 2-3 nights easy for still being able to cook meals there as opposed to always having to eat out.
carol was so kind by letting me borrow a pair of socks as i'd (stupidly) forgotten to pack the pair i had for the wedding in my overnight bag.
we cannot say enough good things about this space that is so well taken care of and is 100% pristine.
plus its location is perfect with easy access to places whilst being quiet and private.

Tom and Carol are such kind, gracious, and attentive hosts. Their beautiful and spacious apartment is immaculate, cozy, inviting, and well equipped with everything. It was a haven of peace and tranquility, and it was the perfect place to land and feel renewed after a long day of travel. I slept so well and woke up feeling refreshed. They went above and beyond to make me feel welcome (including picking me up!). I enjoyed talking with them, and in addition to sharing their experiences in a genuine and heartfelt way, they were also interested in learning about me. They took the time to connect and make me feel at home. I am grateful and would love to come back. They are lovely people offering a serene space in a gorgeous setting. I am deeply grateful!
Such a nice and cute place to stay! Very friendly and great recommendations for food, hikes, anything.
Lovely, quiet spot on the Hood River. Hosts were super and had great food recommendations! Spotless room, plenty of privacy.

I stayed in Tom & Carol's guest suite while exploring Mount Hood and Multnomah Falls. I chose it because it was the only affordable accommodation for me in Hood River, but the cleanliness and comfort of the suite added to my first ever Oregon visit. Bed was very comfortable. Bathroom was nice with hot shower after long day of driving. Tom and Carol personally greeted when I arrived early evening and gave a tour of the suite. I highly recommend this stay to anyone visiting the area.

This was a lovely, quiet, very comfortable place to stay. We had a quick visit but hope to be back in the not too far future for an extended trip! Tom and his wife were extremely nice and despite our short stay, gave us some recommendations we could fit in. The surroundings were absolutely beautiful.

We absolutely loved Toms place, beautiful surroundings on the river, gorgeous room with everything one needs, friendliest hosts, peaceful, amazing gardens with fruit, can’t say enough, we will definitely be back, would have stayed longer but already booked:))

The Hood River Apartment is an excellent place to stay while in the Hood River community. The apartment is located on the Hood River and there is a quiet place by the river sit and read in the shade. The apartment is everything a traveler could want; spacious, clean, lovely setting, quiet, relaxing, full of amenities, comfortable bed, and a special place for children to play and sleep. The hosts are friendly, helpful, and live on the property. In fact, the apartment is on top of the garage of the host's house.
We have friends in Hood River and plan to return. We will definitely stay in the Hood River Apartment . In fact, if the apartment is already booked, I would reschedule our trip so we can stay there.

I only wish I'd been able to stay longer to enjoy the beautiful spot! Very comfortable, convenient, and lovely with several outdoor spaces to enjoy. Cute decor, useful kitchenette amenities, and adorable, creative use of space for kid's sleeping area. I would definitely stay again.
Loved staying here! Felt like I was in the countryside but was only 10 minutes from nice restaurants. Comfy bed too! Tom and Carol are super friendly - felt like home.

We had a wonderful time at Tom & Carol’s place. We felt right at home thanks to their warm welcome, the great conversations and many local tips. The apartment was beautiful and spacious, and had everything we could possibly need. We especially loved the patio at the river with BBQ and the peaceful surroundings. We would absolutely stay here again and hope to return one day!
Wonderful stay! Very affordable especially for all you get, and such beautiful, peaceful location.

This was a great place to stay during our Hood River Fruit Loop trip and I would recommend it to others. It’s on the loop next to one of the farm stand stops with the Hood River right behind the house. The hosts greeted us when we arrived (a first for me!) and showed us the space. They were very friendly and welcoming. The space was clean and cute and had everything we needed during our one night stay. The “bedroom” was more than big enough for a queen size air mattress that we brought with us for an extra bed. Lots of little homey touches and a very easy check in/out process.

Great stay at Tom’s place, only complaint is that I wish I was staying longer to explore the surrounding area more! Easy to find and enter, and Tom is great to speak to with plenty of information to help during your stay.

This place is very clean , nice and warm welcoming by Tom and his wife, Hood river is at the back of his house . He also provide good recommendation for my next trip at Mount Hood . Everything is nice . Thank you so much, i’m sure to highly recommend this place .
Thank you so much
Tanasit

Carol and Tom greeted be upon my arrival. They were super nice and showed me around the room as well as “how to’s”.
I felt very comfortable and their home is beautiful!
The room was clean, organized and literally had everything that I needed.
The bed was so comfortable and their shower also amazing! Very quiet and I had no noise issues.
Very peaceful area which is what I like. I really appreciate that pets aren’t allowed in the space.
The owners had great restaurant recommendations. Everything is very close 10-15 minutes from wineries and downtown. Honestly, one night wasn’t enough!
Overall, I was very happy and pleased with my stay. Definitely one that I’ll be keeping on my favorite list for when I head out to HR again. Great space, great room and friendly hosts!

Very cute guest suite in a very cute area! Best bang for your buck. Tom & his wife were wonderful hosts and welcomed us to their home and gave recommendations for places to eat in town. Clean, cozy, and has all the amenities you could need. Highly recommend and would love to come back.

Tom and Carol’s checkout motto is “just leave!”. That is so funny because A. They’re such welcoming hosts, and B. You’ll really want to “just stay”! So clean and well maintained, we felt like their first guests. Beautiful suite in a lovely property, beautiful location, warm hosts who personally greeted us, showed us around, and gave local recommendations. The private patio is gorgeous, as is the river overlook. Mattress is a supportive cloud. A little bright in the morning if you’re a sleeper-inner, but WHATEVES, you won’t want to sleep in here… too many things to do and see. Wonderful value, no service or cleaning fees, and you have to do NOTHING at check-out, “just leave”. Then you’ll want to come right back
This was a repeat visit for me. Tom’s place is beautiful, comfortable, and a great value. Highly recommended.
Comfortable, clean and overall great place!
Great, peaceful spot in the Hood River. Spacious!

We chose this place because we had a wedding to attend to in the area and it has great reviews. But the experience was so pleasant and I’d love to come back again soon for a quick get-away. The kitchen and bathroom are on the same floor which made everything so easy. The river’s right outside the door. Staying for 2 nights wasn’t enough! It was very clean and small decors here and there were so cute. The kitchen has everything and they provide so many towels! We didn’t use that many but it was nice to have them. My hubs and I will definitely come back. Thank you Tom for the great space! :)

Tom's place was fantastic! Great location, super clean, and peaceful . Tom and Carol were great hosts, you can tell they put a lot of thought and care into this place! The property was beautiful and the apartment had everything we needed. The bed was super comfortable which was very nice after a long day of hiking! We very much enjoyed our stay and would 100% stay here again!
Wonderful location and very comfortable. I highly recommend this place. I’ll be going back.

We had a quick trip to Hood River for a wedding and it was the perfect place to stay! It was cozy, clean and the bed was so comfy. Tom was there to welcome us and show us around and gave us a great recommendation for breakfast! Very quiet and peaceful but still very close to the downtown area.
Such a beautiful setting! We felt so privileged to sit by the river on a private patio. Gorgeous house, stunning location, and super friendly hosts. Thank you Tom!
Fantastic hospitality!
Wonderful location. Very nice home.

Tom and Carol have put a lot of thought and care into this apartment. It is well designed and has a lots of fun and creative touches, including a kids sleeping area and skylights with tree views. It is in a beautiful location near orchards.
I had a short stay, but they greeted me right away and showed me how to use everything in the apartment. This made it easy to relax and settle in right away. The kitchen and bathroom were well supplied and I didn't need anything that wasn't already there.
It was a special treat to sit on the patio and watch the river in the evening.

Great stay! Love the beautiful setting, openness of the main room and separate entry. Everything was super clean and the bed was very comfortable. Loved the shampoo & conditioner provided as well. Very nice hosts and will definitely book again with them when in Hood River in the future.

Comfortable place with very friendly hosts, a lovely bathtub, and great mattress. Private entrance from the outside. Close river views and plenty of space for one or two people. Hood River is a wonderful spot to explore with lots of activities close by (by car), and a rich history. Heads up: there is no stove and no coffee maker that takes ground coffee. Cooking option is the microwave. They do have a coffee pod-machine. The apartment is separated from the main house with a cool sliding barn door, and while the design of the apartment is cozy and well-done, I could hear the hosts. They were super nice and considerately quiet, so it wasn't a problem, but there was more shared soundscape than I anticipated. I highly recommend this place for anyone who wants a good base to explore the area from, and who enjoys engaging with their hosts and learning about the area. Tom and Carol are a wealth of knowledge.

Very friendly and welcoming space! I had an excellent experience. They are just out ofntown enough to get privacy and quiet, but close enough to get everything you need. Bed was super comfy and may have prevented me from hiking more because I was relaxing!! Highly recommend!! Thank you!!!

Tom and Carol where outstanding hosts. While we need not need any assistance during our visit, we knew that Tom and Carol were there eager to help if needed. Tom and Carol are very friendly and welcoming while also giving guests their own space. Beautiful location above the river.

Tom and Carol are very nice folks. The place is impeccably clean, and Carol’s attention to detail really shines through with all the little touches she includes to make your stay comfortable. It is a lovely place for a great value!
Head’s up though: it is a barn-door style door which separates the staircase to the guest suite from the hallway which leads to their main living area. This barn-door style doesn’t fully close onto a door jam, so it does not make much of a sound barrier. Tom insisted that they couldn’t hear anything, but then also happened to mention how much I work, so, had to have been over-hearing that I was in meetings.. If you are a remote worker who needs to be able to take calls privately - the only room with a full door is the bathroom.
Delightful stay! The place was well furnished and very clean - enjoyed the setting by the Hood River and the hosts were friendly and helpful

Close to Mt Hood and Hood River. Beautiful setting.
One unique thing is that there is a barn door style closure that does not lock. The entry connects the stairs to the apartment with the hosts living area - you can hear them and they can hear you;-)
Not bad, but not a completely separate entrance.

Beautiful apartment upstairs in a lovely home right on a river, an amazing spot. Spotlessly clean, every little detail covered. Lots of light, comfortable bed. Met Tom & Carol, they couldn’t be nicer or more friendly. Wish we could give more than 5 stars. We’ll be back.
Hosts are very friendly and welcoming. The place is very warm and inviting. We felt right at home!
awesome
Another pleasant stay at Tom's place. Although the weather didn't work out for cycling, we were able to do some hikes in HR and The Dalles. We'll be back when it warms up.
Thank you Tom, What a wonderful place. The ride home was an adventure
Great communication and recommendations for places to go in town.

Tom was a great host. Was very easy to find the place and easy access to get to the apartment above the garage. Had lots of great suggestions on where to eat and what to do in the area. Would highly recommend.

Tom's place was a very affordable and comfortable stay for a long weekend! The kitchenette is well-stocked and has a big enough mini-fridge for several items, and the bed was very comfy! A wonderful, cozy little place for a Hood river getaway.

This was my second stay in this beautiful location. The space is roomy, very clean, private, and extremely comfortable. I highly recommend this spot. The host is very responsive and this is one of the best values in the Gorge.
Wonderful place!
Quiet, clean and very convenient for us ! Very well thought out for comfort and amenities!
Wonderful space for sleeping and fixing simple meals. Very quiet location and reasonably private separate unit in a private residence.
a gem. We'll be back soon!

Carol and Tom are a lovely couple and uber friendly. They were happy with me staying in their place on very short notice. The apartment was very clean and cozy and lacked nothing that I needed. My stay was brief. I hope I can stay there again in the future and soak up the calming sounds of the river that flows close by. I highly recommend Tom and Carol’s place for anyone visiting the area.
Tom and Carol received us at arrival and ensured we were well acquainted with the space. Great communication. Comfortable setting. Lovely area!

Although our stay was short, we had a great time. The hosts were very friendly and accommodating. They gave us great suggestions on places we should visit, gave us a tour of the room before we came in, and made sure the bathroom and kitchen areas were fully stocked. The shampoo, conditioner, and body wash were all great quality. There was a heater in the room, which was adjustable. Tom also let us park under the covered patio, since the weather conditions were rainy. Overall, the experience was great and I would recommend staying here.

Tom and Carol’s place was a fantastic stay for our end of year getaway at Hood River. The weather was unseasonably cold (-13 degrees Celsius…) but we felt right at home in their warm and cosy AirBnB. They are the kindest couple and we really enjoyed getting to know them during our stay. Would definitely come back again!

Tom and his wife were excellent hosts. They welcomed me with great conversation and excellent local recommendations (a great local brewery at night and a local diner for breakfast). The living area was not only clean but very cozy. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was nice and clean. I can’t recommend this place enough. If I’m ever in the area again this is where I’m staying.

We had such a wonderful visit!! Tom suggested great places to eat and he kindly showed us around the Airbnb. Soon after we arrived, we visited the apple store right next door, and brought home a delicious strawberry- peach pie, which we devoured. We slept well, in such a comfortable bed. It’s really nice being centrally located in the “ fruit loop” area. We would love to go back and stay there again.

The place was perfect. Tom and his wife were the best hosts. They thought of everything in the surprisingly roomy apartment. Very comfortable and inviting. The place is located on a river so the sound of the river at the covered sitting area was so relaxing. We will be back again in the future.
The space is just adorable and I really appreciated Carol saying hi. I was very comfortable and felt at home.

Tom and Carol are super friendly and knowledgeable of the area. The accommodation is luxurious and ideal for a couple. There are spots to sit and enjoy the Hood river with a peaceful ambience. The town of Hood River, the Columbia River Gorge and all its waterfalls and trails, the Fruit Loop provide so many options to explore.
Cute place, fresh air, and right by the river. It was clean and comfortable, we would definitely stay again.

We loved our stay at Tom's Place! We were in Hood River for a wedding, and Tom's Place was the perfect location for us. Tom and Karol were great hosts, and gave us some excellent recommendations for things to do and places to eat while in the area. We would definitely come back!

The pics don’t do this place justice. A total GEM! Beautiful quarters for our stay with all the amenities. You can tell Tom & Carol have worked hard to make sure guests feel right at home. We loved it here, enjoyed the area & the apple country store had the best milkshakes!
If we’re ever back we will book again

Such a lovely beautiful and very private apartment! They thought of everything! The outdoor sitting area down by the river is so peaceful and beautiful! Carol was so welcoming and informative, and a very fun lady! She really made me feel very comfortable.
Great place and host!

Carol & Tom's place is a Gem. One of the best Airbnb stays.
Beautiful home, grounds & the river is just gorgeous. The space is private, clean, quiet & they thought of everything one might need. Easy check in. Carol greeted us and she is a pleasure to talk to. My husband & I will definitely stay here next time we're in town.

Highly recommended. Lovely place, clean, good bed, great shower, super friendly host and perfect location to discover and taste the area (wines fruits pies milkshakes!) hood river is super close and an adorable town. Hope to come back one day
Stay was great.. so was Tom .. would stay again!

Tom and Carol graciously accommodated my short-notice booking request and late evening arrival, and greeted me with kind words and friendly conversation before I turned in. What an amazing value and thoughtfully created room and kitchenette. I kept the windows open so I could hear the river overnight. I'll be back!
Beautifull house , very clean and next to the river , the best airbnb ever. Host very nice.
The suite was quiet and private - very comfortable.
Beautiful and quiet location, comfortable space, friendly people who communicate well, and exceptionally clean. What more could you want? Stop looking, and book it!
Second time staying here, it's a lovely place!

This is certainly the best Air BnB we’ve stayed in. Virginia offers so many thoughtful touches, it feels like home. This spot is close to town. The space itself is immaculate. If you’re heading to Hood River, book this space ASAP. You won’t regret it.
Really clean beautiful spot in an awesome location

Virginia's home was very comfortable and roomy. The mattress was excellent, one thing I find very important and often unmentioned in reviews, so that is why I include it here. There were nice touches in the space such as exercise mats, some straps and light weights, plus lots of guide books and maps for outdoor adventuring.
If you are sensitive to light while sleeping an eye mask might be a good thing to pack as there was a fair amount of light entering through the blinds from the street.
A question the host texted to us after our departure left us feeling a bit off about our stay.
Virginia's place was the perfect spot for our stay in Hood River! It felt like we had our own private apartment. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to the area!

Virginia’s home airbab is without question a Home Run.
Lovely comfortable home. Everything about home was excellent. I highly recommend Viriginia’s home for visitors to the Hood River area. It is Centrally locates.
What an amazing stay. You won’t be disappointed!

A wonderful private space close to town. We loved the walkability and close proximity to spectacular hikes. The space is well-appointed, comfortable, and spacious.
Virginia is a great host that is readily available should you have questions

We had a large group. The host were responsive and flexible on check-in prior to our arrival and during our stay. There was plenty of room for everyone. Fully stocked with delicious coffee and games. Beautiful view. Walkable restaurants with organic or local ingredients. We weren't ready to leave..
Such a fun place for a group, it was a great spot!

We had our entire bridal party and their significant others stay with us the night before and after our wedding! lodge 902 was the perfect place to gather with our best friends! I couldn’t recommend the house enough!!

Exactly like the photos. Love the historic charm of the 100+ year old lodge. Sure there are creaky floors and such, which is to be expected. Views of the river from the veranda are lovely. Each private suite was comfortable. Loved walking into town and grabbing wine, ice cream, lunch. Fabulous location with reserved parking? Perfect!
We had a large group and all wanted to stay together and the Lodge accommodated us perfectly!! The records were a bonus and the bedding was comfy!

Lodge 902 was the perfect place to stay with friends while celebrating a birthday in Hood River. We had people coming in from far and wide and they were all taken with the home, its quintessential PNW touches, and proximity to fun activities and delicious food. Each day began with a walk downtown for coffee and ended with drinks and games in the cozy family room. Could not have asked for a better place to spend time with friends and family!
A great place - will come again!
Great stay, love the lodge!
Lodge 902 was perfect for a work retreat! Plenty of space for team dinners and strategy sessions.
This was a perfect spot for our team retreat. We loved that everyone had their own lockable room with a private bathroom. Great common areas and the sunroom worked perfectly for our meeting room.

Lodge 902 is a favorite! We reserved the entire property for a retreat and it was perfect. The hosts are super communicative and quick to respond. The location is perfect and so convenient to all that Hood River and the surrounding area have to offer. A bonus was the off street parking to accommodate our group! We'll definitely book again.

We have a 16 person real estate team and it's hard to find a place to accommodate all of us. This was our 3rd stay for an annual trip and we always have so much fun at Lodge 902! It is spacious with fun decor, old world charm, close to everything and best of all the games! We hung out in the living area and played game after game and laughed a lot. The spacious porch with rocking chairs is lovely, great linens and cozy beds. It's right in town so there is traffic driving by but we don't mind that at all and didn't notice it inside. It's so close to everything in Hood River Downtown. The parking lot is great too!

Our whole family 6-67, really enjoyed our stay. This house, built in 1911, is exquisite. Beautiful woodwork, large rooms and fun just to explore and experience. All updates were done with top quality materials and workmanship. Nothing lacking in terms of fun games, kitchenware, glasses and linens. HC and beds were top notch.

Nice bathrooms in all the bedrooms. Large kitchen and dining area and a very nice breakfast nook for morning coffee. Downtown Hood River is within walking distance.
We held our 2nd annual family gathering at Lodge 902 and had a great time. There were 15 adults and 1 toddler and had plenty of room to move around.
Our hostess was terrific in responding to our phone calls and making sure are concerns were answered.
We'd definitely would recommend Lodge 902.

We had a wonderful stay with our big group. They had so much stuff for cooking and tons of space for people to play games, watch movies or just hang out. We dug the funny signs and instructions through out. The place has great personality. We also enjoyed the fire and games to choose from. Would definitely stay again. Oh and so close to restaurants and breweries.

Very cool concept. House is setup like a hostel, great decorations and lot's of thoughtful touches on the decor. Having an ensuite for every bedroom was great. Host was responsive to all our questions. Only disappointment was the cleanliness. The house was very dusty and many of the dishes and pans were dirty with dried on food from previous guests. Had to do some basic cleaning before we could feel comfortable. Host did offer to send cleaning crew but we were already settled in and once we cleaned up we were fine.

Wonderful location with an easy walk into downtown shops and restaurants. The house itself has a ton of charm, perfect for hosting a large group with an expansive dining table and kitchen facilities. It's a little drafty in the house, so some additional space heaters would be nice. It seems like the party prior to ours left quite a lot of garbage in the bins, which had exploded into the parking lot due to wind or animals or both. It was a huge eye sore and rough first impression as we welcomed team members into the house. Overall, we'd go back, though!
Phenomenal stay and setup for six couples. Can’t say enough about how cool this gem of a place is!

We hosted our wedding party at the Lodge, and it was an incredible experience! Everyone commented on how unique and beautiful the space was, and the views were gorgeous. Walking distance to so many great spots in Hood River. Plenty of room for hosting large gatherings. So cozy. I cannot recommend this place enough!

Enjoyed a special family celebration in Lodge 902. Perfect for our group —bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms for all. Lots of places to hang together with plenty of seating. Beautiful views of the river and walkable to Hood River center.

Booked the lodge for the bridal party of my daughter's destination wedding in Hood River. I wanted my gift to her to be time to enjoy with her dearest friends. The Lodge did not disappoint! It was a wonderful gathering place for all. Everyone enjoyed their own impeccably designed bedroom (and bath - a big plus!) and the funky and eccentric "vibe" of the house fit them perfectly. It was spacious, clean, and with fun little touches everywhere, Lodge 902 made for a truly unique accommodation. Highly recommend!

This is a great place to stay if you have a large group visiting Hood River. It’s very walkable to restaurants and shops. There was a lot of space for our large group to spread out, and we definitely enjoyed the view from the veranda. Few small things to note: some things in the house were broken (ceiling fan in Room 1, fridge missing handles) and some of their extensive board game collection is unusable due to broken items and missing pieces. Pillows get super flat as you sleep, so bring your own if you can! Lastly, we didn’t get responses to questions around check-out, but we were so appreciative that we weren’t required to do a ton of check-out responsibilities! None of this really impacted our stay overall and we would definitely return!
Great option for a family to stay all together and have their own space.

Beautiful gorgeous house! Looks just like the photos with some minor issues but overall great place for a big group. We hosted our wedding party which was perfect, there were multiple areas to get ready and beautiful natural light for wedding makeup but 10am check out is very early the morning after the wedding so something to be mindful of! Overall loved our stay and would recommend!
Lodge 902 worked perfectly for our small group retreat! There was a great conference room area with tv that we used for meeting times. Would highly recommend, and hope to be back again!
Big, comfortable home for a wedding party. We had a ball!

This place was perfect for my large family pre/post wedding stay. We were 13 adults so used one of the additional apartments. The on-suite baths were a real winner with this group. Go, you’ll enjoy the easy walk downtown and the comfy/quirky hang out spaces!!!
Charming, comfortable, cozy, and overall amazing place! If you are staying in Hood River with a big group, couldn’t recommend lodge 902 more!!

This lodge is nothing short of amazing! It fit our large group and very comfortably. They have literally thought of everything here! It’s great for families, girls trips, or even just couples! Close to shopping and food! Just a short 5 min drive down to the river too! Don’t pass this up!

We stayed here for our wedding weekend and it was perfect! Very spacious and has a lot of character. Felt homey and beautiful view. We especially loved the side and front porch and big windows in the back. Highly recommend for a large group. Great walking distance to downtown!

We stayed here with fourteen friends during our wedding weekend. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience - what an amazing space to host friends in. We couldn’t recommend this place more highly for a large group looking for a memorable time.

We loved the house and the excellent decor. Very cozy and inviting home with lots of spaces for gathering with your loved ones. The host Sarah was super helpful about everything that we need in and around the home.
We highly recommend and would visit again!

We rented this house for our groomsmen and their partners during our wedding weekend and it was absolutely perfect for the occasion! I was born and raised in Hood River, and can say wholeheartedly that you truly can’t beat this location. The house is spacious, fun, comfortable and well appointed. Our hosts were also extremely accommodating and responsive throughout the entire process. Thank you Lodge 902!

Our daughter was getting married in White Salmon and we were looking for a base for us and our extended family Lodge 902 was perfect, it was a great size, everyone had their own bathroom and it was spotless! It had everything you could possibly need during your stay and the owner was super responsive to all my questions We will definitely be back
Great place. Great location. We loved it!

We were a large family staying here for a summer trip. Lodge 902 was a perfect fit! Each family had their own space and bathroom. The kiddos even had a play area just for them. The place was also very walkable. Lots of hills but nothing was too far. We especially loved the playground a little further up the hill. It seriously had everything! I would totally recommend this house for a large group wanting to see Hood River for the first time or anytime really!
Perfect for our friends and family during our wedding weekend.

Wonderful place with endless character and timeless decor.
Comfortable beds and private baths with each room.

Lodge 902 was our home base for a family reunion for wedding week for our daughter's wedding. The kitchen was well equipped for the family dinners that were whipped up every night. The location is fantastic as there are so many shops, restaurants, coffee shops, wineries that were just a short stroll away. The host was very responsive during our stay with any questions that arose and provided a great list of places and activities to do upon arrival. Our whole family enjoyed the stay immensely. We will definitely come back again!

Lodge 902 did not disappoint in any way. Perfect for large family group to be together yet have private space as desired. Location allowed walkability to restaurants and bars plus had breathtaking views of the surroundings! Highly recommended!

Perfect AirBnB. Very charming and large house located on a beautiful street which was walkable to town. The layout was perfect for a large group. Each room had plenty of privacy and their own bathrooms. Very cool game and entertainment room in the basement. A nice view from then dining room. Would love to come back!
Amazing place!

We rented the entire lodge including the two apartments for our family. It was great to have enough room to hold our family and friends who traveled from all over the country to celebrate our son's wedding in White salmon.
There was plenty of space for everyone, including space for the children to play and be loud away from the adults!
The rooms were quiet, the kitchen was well equipped. We cooked multiple meals for multiple people with all the pots and pans we needed.

Perfect for our daughter’s wedding party and family. Everything was “as advertised” only better. Plenty of space for everyone to move around or spend time in their rooms. I would highly recommend for a large group.

Super cool house, full of character and fun decorations. It felt like something out of a Wes Anderson movie! This is a great place for a large group - each bedroom has a queen or king size bed and an en suite bathroom, plus abundant parking.

We rented out the whole place for our wedding party for our wedding weekend! Our wedding party enjoyed their stay and found the amenities and its location in pristine condition! This place is AWESOME and the host was great! Highly recommend

What a fantastic place! We were in town for our son’s wedding. The Lodge offered us the perfect place for family and friends to stay. The location was perfect to walk to town for meals and R&R time. Thank you Lodge 902

Lodge 902 is so cute and in probably the best location in Hood River. Coffee, restaurants, tasting rooms, and shopping is all within 10 minutes of walking. The house was huge and very cozy.
Everything was great for my team. Perfect set up!

The lodge was a comfortable, clean, and cozy place for our large group. We loved the thoughtfully decorated rooms and cool books to hangout. Communication with hosts was good and checkin super easy. We would love to stay again.

We rented the entire lodge for a retreat and it was perfect! Excellent! The Lodge had everything we needed for an enjoyable corporate retreat. Every bedroom had a dedicated bathroom, and there was plenty of common space for us to meet, eat and play games. Lodge 902 was a great spot for our family gathering of 14, grandma; children with spouses and grandchildren. It was an historic building with a variety of interesting memorabilia. It had room for our group to gather together for meals and games.

Great place for a business retreat!
We loved the 902 Lodge! The host was so friendly and helpful and the Lodge was beautiful. Plenty of parking, walking distance to the main attractions, quiet area. Would definitely recommend!

10/10! Loved all of it!

Awesome house for a family or large group getaway. Our adult slumber party was super fun, with tons of game options, lots of fireplaces and both gathering and private space for everyone. We’ll be back - one of the most fun homes we’ve stayed at!
every bedroom has a bathroom which was a huge bonus for our family. the place was fabulous and we will be back

We used the lodge for our 16-person annual gathering of college girlfriends and it might be the best place we've rented in 20 years. The lodge itself offers very comfortable sleeping (the six rooms on the top two floors all have private baths and the two units on the lower floor are small one-bedroom apartments). It's really nicely equipped with all the dishes, seating, and games/puzzles/books a large group needs. Plus, it's just a few blocks from downtown HR and the beautiful riverfront. Sarah and her partners were extremely responsive to any and all requests and questions. Be aware that the lodge is right on Oak Street, which is a busy road, so there's traffic noise on the street-facing rooms but that calms down a bit during nighttime hours. Also, read the listing details carefully if you want to sleep 16 people because the two downstairs apartments require an additional fee. All in all, this is a fantastic place for big groups.
Awesome place to stay! Perfect location and lodge was awesome!

Lodge 902 was the perfect place for our large group to stay for a week! We truly had the best time! Our group all felt so comfortable/safe during our time. Would definitely stay here again and again!! Thank you for the best week, Lodge 902!

For big groups, there's not a better place to stay in Hood River. It's super unique and fun with lots of space for everyone. We're definitely going to stay again next time we go to Hood River with a big group.
Great location and very responsive hosts!

We were here for one side of a family wedding and had a wonderful stay here. The lodge has a wonderful kitchen and common areas so a lot of people can eat and talk. The location is really great. It is a very nice place!
loved our stay! we stayed with a group of friends at the Lodge and had a great time! it’s a quirky house and was great to entertain. Also a huge plus that each room has its own bathroom.

Lodge 902 was the perfect home base for our group’s Hood River adventures. It was great for each couple to have privacy in their individual rooms while sharing the awesome common areas. We appreciate the attention to detail and had so much fun at the lodge!
Awesome place and location. Enjoyed the character of the place! Owners were excellent with communication!

This place is perfect for a large family gathering. My family stayed here during my wedding weekend. There's enough space for everyone to still have privacy and their own bathrooms. This house was perfect for our large family! Every couple had a room with a bathroom! the rooms were larger than pictured. Beautiful house, great for groups.

We rented this house for a family reunion, and it worked perfectly for all our cousins who now travel with their spouses and significant others. The house was in the perfect location just blocks from downtown. We are definitely planning on staying at lodge 902 again!
great location, view, easy access to everything.
Great location and beautiful home
Fabulous place, highly recommend it. We had an amazing family vacation stay here.
Wonderful hosts, great communication, beautiful lodge. highly recommended
What a great house in such a great location! Beautiful views and a gorgeous house!
Wonderful property for large groups. We had 4 different families staying together for a wedding nearby. Plenty of space and lovely decor. Great location. Would definitely recommend!
This house is in a great location and is so unique! It also comfortably sleeps a large group. We had a great time for a company team building event and would definitely recommend.

Lodge 902 is the perfect stay for large groups. We rented out the lodge and apartments for our wedding party and everything was gorgeous, guests were comfortable, game setup is incredible. This is a must stay!

We are so happy that we decided to splurge on Lodge 902 for our son's wedding weekend. We could also easily walk to town to grab coffee, sample breweries/wineries, or just explore. Our hosts were very responsive on the few times we contacted them with questions. We would highly recommend Lodge 902 for your gathering. And don't underestimate how nice it is to have a bathroom for each bedroom!
(note: we also rented the 2 apartments on the lower level).
Great location! Great for large groups. Loved that each room had its own bathroom and there was plenty of space for us to gather.
Great house in a great location! The beds were comfortable and the hosts were very communicative. Would highly recommend!

Lodge 902 was the perfect place to host my husband and I plus our friends for our wedding this last weekend. It held everyone so well, and we all had a quiet space to return to when we needed it. Such a beautiful place!

Lodge 902 was the perfect venue; renting the entire lodge for 2 nights for the families to stay together as we gathered in Hood River for a micro wedding. Everything exceeded our expectations; it is all that it promises and more! If you are looking to gather family or a large group in Hood River, Lodge 902 is the place!

This house is amazing! It is so well thought out and the decor is so fun! There’s so much to see without it being too overdone. The games that are there are great. Very comfortable accommodations and the view is outstanding!
Our stay at Lodge 902 was absolutely perfect! We had people in from all over, and we couldn't have asked for a better space and location. We definitely want to come back! Thank you for everything!!

Great place in a fantastic location. Was an awesome setting for a group of business leaders to meet. Every room was really nice and every room having a dedicated, in-suite bathroom was excellent. Owners are super responsive, too!

great!

The lodge was awesome! Would highly recommend and would stay again!

The lodge exceeded our expectations and surpassed the listing photos. Each space is thoughtfully designed and well supplied. There was more than enough room and options for entertainment/activities.
The location was ideal - a short walk to shops, cafes and breweries.
This is a special place, run with excellence. Highly recommended!
This place is amazing!!! Not only did it offer perfect location and tons of space, but it was clean and decorated so well! Would recommend to others and plan to stay again!

I think this might be the 5th time Ive used Lodge 902 for our work retreat. It is always an amazing experience. Each room provides its own unique experience that is both fun and restful. The common areas have a great balance of space for groups, as well as, nooks for reading or relaxing alone. If you're considering a retreat, family get together, or looking for a single room. I highly recommend using Lodge 902. You won't regret it!

A really fun spot that is so nicely curated. We loved our stay at Lodge 902. We were lucky enough to rent the whole space for our group. It was such a great weekend. A great location - just a short 7 minute walk to downtown Hood River and close to many other restaurants, stores, and tasting rooms.
Wonderful place to stay. Close to everything and room for multiple families or friend groups. The private parking lot was an amazing perk as well.

Our family rented the entire Lodge 902 for New Years. We really enjoyed the location and character of the lodge! We walked downtown everyday for coffee, takeout, shopping, etc. The lodge was very homey and fully stocked for all of our needs. In every nook and cranny you could find something new and exciting to see or play with(games galore)! We also loved the way the lodge is set up with everyone having their own bedroom and bathroom! The TV room in the basement was great for the kids while the adults chatted around the fire upstairs! We would highly recommend Lodge 902 to any of our friends or family! We absolutely LOVED IT!
Would Stay Again! Terrific Spot for a Small Business Team Bonding. Each room has it's own bathroom. Terrific spot for a Family Reunion. This place has Character! Fun!

This was my second rental of the entire space of Lodge 902. The hosts are so quick to respond and friendly. The space has had a bit of remodel and added amenities since the last time I stayed and it's even better! They added a movie room downstairs, 2 full apartments and a fun lounge and entertainment space. We rented the entire 3 floors to ourself and we really couldn't have asked for more in a space and location. There are special touches in every room, shopping/dining and entertainment are right outside the door within blocks, and ample parking for guests in the included lot. I highly recommend Lodge 902! I wish there was a space like this in every city.
Great big house, fun games. It was also close to beach. Loved many spots where we were able to sit ik big group. Would love to visit again.
Worth the price! Kitchen had everything you needed. So many games and giant scrabble! Lots of room. We had the best time - would rent again!

One of the most unique lodges I have ever stayed at - the most fun and classy decorations and small touches. And the simple things like clean bathrooms in all rooms, comfortable beds, and a plethora of coffee were even better than expected. We spent all weekend wishing we could own this place ourselves!
Its our third time using Lodge 902 and we'll definitely be back. I would highly recommend to anyone wanting a restful stay or to explore the Hood River area.

Amazing house downtown Hood River. We were there for Labor Day weekend with friends and we really enjoyed our stay. The house is very convenient with lot of space and so many games for the kids!! We’ll definitely think about it for a future friends gathering and highly recommend it.
Fantastic!
Lodge 902 is a treasure. Thank you
Wonderful space, amazing location
My family & I had a lovely wedding week stay at Lodge 902!
What an awesome stay! Beautifully decorated in a great area. Hoping we can come back soon!

We have loved staying at Lodge 902 two times now and plan to go back a third. Excellent location, stylish spaces, and a relaxing atmosphere. If you're considering staying here I would encourage you to book. You won't regret it.
Amazing!!! Fun place to stay

We absolutely loved the atmosphere of the house.
Everything inside was so awesome and Ellen was very responsive to make sure we have everything we needed.
Every room feels so different and unique.
We felt like home and didn’t want to leave
Awesome views, great hosts and so close to downtown. There were 11 of us and still so much room for everyone of us. Kitchen was supplied with everything we needed and we loved the decor of the place.
Awesome place! Will for sure rent it again with friends!
Great house in a great location. Perfect for our family reunion.
Excellent home. Clean and spacious in the perfect location

Lodge 902 is one of the best Airbnb experiences I have ever had. The house is HUGE and every single inch of it is designed for relaxation and recreation. We had a staff retreat here and the house is set up perfectly for groups (and couples) on all three floors. The jetted tubs were my favorite as well as the flat screens in every room. We had a wonderful dinner at Double Mountain Brewery and came back to the house and played all the games that are stocked in the living room. Everyone commented how nice the space was and I definitely would love to come back and stay at Lodge 902 anytime!

PERFECT Hood River Vacation for our Staff Retreat. We loved all the thoughtful touches and well designed spaces. Hosts were very communicative and we had a lovely dinner at Double Mountain brewery nearby. The jetted tubs were my favorite and the kitchen was well stocked. Thanks again for a wonderful stay.

902 is amazing for large groups. Every inch is thoughtfully decorated. It was a great space for our group and we loved the bathroom in each bedroom. We will definitely return to 902 and recommend as a sweet space for gathering!
We did a corporate off-site and the space was amazing. Perfect for bonding and getting work done
We rented the whole space and had a magical family weekend for my husband's 50th birthday.
Such a cute place! Very thoughtfully decorated and perfect for family get always or business team trips. We will definitely be back!
You can’t go wrong with this place. The location, amenities, decor and an abundance of space for all age ranges is unbeatable. We loved it and hope to make it an annual trip for our families.

This is a beautifully appointed, well taken care of home, perfect for retreats!
Our group settled in and immediately got down to having fun. The various hang out spaces were clean, artfully decorated and comfy.
Kitchen was fairly well stocked, and had plenty of room. All the guest quarters were equally excellent.
A few questions came up, and the hosts responded quickly.
All in all, we found the space fantastic, and are looking forward to coming back!

We rented the entire lodge for the week of Christmas. Our family ranges from 2-66 years old and everyone had such a wonderful time. The location is perfect, easy walk to all of the action in Hood River. Our family had a stress-free holiday thanks to the beautiful Lodge 902 and all that it offers!
Great place for a large group. Loved that each room and its own bathroom. Can walk to everything down town.

My colleagues and I stayed here for a company retreat (for the second time), and it really is a perfect setup. Since it's operated as a B&B, each person gets the privacy of a locked room and ensuite bath - plus lots of common space including a well equipped kitchen. Highly recommend for a small company event.

We loved our stay at the Lodge... 6 full beds with baths, such a luxe experience to each have our own space! The decor is amazing, so fun. Beds were comfy. Location was great, could walk to various restaurants. Will definitely stay here again!
What a great place! Huge, house spread across 3 floors. Comfortable beds, great gathering spaces. Walkable to downtown. Perfect for large groups.
We loved our time at the lodge! Perfect getaway for all my girlfriends. Renting out the entire space was so perfect and easy... will definitely come back!

Lodge 902 is amazing! And so is the team running it! We held a team offsite/executive planning meeting here for 8 people and it was a hit all around. Plenty of space and privacy for individuals but great gathering places for groups. Fun and lively decor, and in great condition. We used a recommend chef for a team cooking competition - the chef and the space were perfect. Thank you! The team has already voted and we will be back!

I booked this place for an employee retreat and honestly could not have asked for a better spot. Every little detail went above and beyond what I would have expected, and the location was perfect. I can’t recommend Lodge 902 enough!
The lodge itself was amazing! Great layout, full amenities, fantastic location. The beds were incredibly comfortable and it was wonderful for each room to have their own bathroom. Highly recommend!

We rented out the entire lodge for a small leaders retreat and the space was perfect. You have small nooks to reflect, read, or recharge. You also have fun gathering places for games, movies, and good conversation. The lodge is located in a beautiful spot looking out on the gorge. It is peaceful, restful, and fun. Everything we were looking for. I would highly recommend it.
Beautiful space and fantastic location! Loved all the little details. They were responsive to messages and flexible with accommodations. Thank you!

We rented the whole place for the weekend for our October wedding. Just a small intimate ceremony with a few friends, nothing crazy. We were able to stop by in May to meet up with Ellen for a quick tour so we could get an idea of the layout beforehand (so kind of her)! Lodge 902 ended up being perfect on so many levels! The decor is amazing - thoughtful, quirky touches everywhere! Every room has a bathroom and shower. Lots of space throughout the house for everyone to relax and hang out. An awesome collection of board games - even a giant playable scrabble board on the wall downstairs. We fixed a meal for everyone on Saturday night and the large kitchen had everything we needed, including 2 ovens and plenty of place settings for all 14 of us. Sunday morning we had Sonja fix breakfast for us (not typically included when renting the whole place, but so glad we decided to add this on!). Delicious and so easy for us! For Sunday night, we reviewed the catering list that Ellen had provided and decided to have Boda's Kitchen cater dinner. They dropped it off in chafers and we were all set- again, so easy!! Overall our stay was fantastic and all of our friends kept commenting on what a wonderful place we'd found. A few of them are even planning to look into Lodge 902 for upcoming family and work gatherings. If you are looking for a beautiful, quirky place and want super helpful/responsive hosts, look not further! :)
We were blown away by Lodge 902. It was a great place to stay for our work group. Fun and funky is the best way to describe it. We look forward to staying here again in the future.
I cannot say enough good things about this place. You are in for an absolute treat staying here!

We absolutely loved this space! There were 12 adults and we each had our own space and bathroom. We loved hanging out on the deck and that we could walk downtown. Everything you could need is provided: two coffee makers, blender and tons of board games. The record player was epic! Most importantly, there are tons of wine glasses! The bedding was very comfortable and the pillows are clearly great quality. We loved the eclectic decor. We will be back. We could not have found a better spot for our group. Thanks for the perfect lodge!
Loved the space for our offsite. It’s a destination in and of itself.

This spot is a total gem. It’s charming, quaint, comfortable and amazingly furnished. It’s sparkling clean and walking distance to anything and everything in town. The hosts were so friendly and helpful. We will most definitely be back.
Lodge 902 is fantastic! Amazingly decorated, cozy but with lots of room to spread out, fun surprises around every corner! We ended up eating our meals in so we could enjoy the beautiful space!

Our group really enjoyed our stay at Lodge 902. It was a stylish, comfortable space that included everything we needed and more. Excellent location with great view of the windsurfers on the river. Lovely balcony for taking in the views. We wish we could’ve stayed longer!

Lodge 902 was an amazing place to stay! It was great for our large group - each room has a private bathroom, there is privacy for each bedroom, and tons of gathering spaces including two large dining tables.
The decorations are really stylish but also warm and there are tons of little touches throughout the house. The location is also great, you can walk to everything in downtown Hood River.
Our group loved our stay at Lodge 902! Very cool space for large groups.

Super comfortable place. Gorgeous views, and many separate areas for a large group to relax in -- the veranda, the living room, downstairs. We couldn't have asked for more -- the beds are great and the eclectic rooms always offered something new to look at.

Excellent place for family reunion. With 8 bedrooms / 8.5 baths, there was plenty of space for everyone, but also plenty of space to come together. Very nice location close to town (walked down to get ice cream every night!) with beautiful views of the river. Fully stocked kitchen. Fun funky decor. A couple blocks from a cool kids playground too. Loads of board games, and the old video console was a huge hit with the kids. Couldn’t have asked for a better vacation.

As noted in previous reviews the Lodge is 100% the place to be! We took over the whole house and my entire family ranted and raved about it non-stop. Lodge 902 is full of carefully curated design details for your fun and comfort. We absolutely loved our time at the Lodge and highly recommend for your next trip to Hood River!!
What a wonderful and fun place to stay with our bridal party. So stylish, accommodating, amazing location, couldn’t rave more about the place. Thank you so much!

Great family space! We were in town for our son’s wedding and wanted our immediate family of 11 under one roof! Comfy beds, ample relaxation, eating and board game space!
Lodge 902 also has wonderful views of Mt Adams and the Columbia River! Very convenient to downtown too! Plan to come back someday!
Super hip and cute house! Plenty of space. The Pac-Man arcade game downstairs was a huge hit!

An interesting house with space and activities for everyone, very comfortable for all, with a great kitchen that made cooking for our large group possible. I would love to know the history of the house.
Lodge 902 was great! The house is massive with some many cool areas and little design touches. And you can't beat the location just a few blocks from downtown Hood River.
Great place to stay for a group

Perfect place to rent out and celebrate a milestone birthday! Tons of space, fully stocked kitchen, beautiful spot, easy to walk to downtown HR! Owners are very responsive and easy to work with. They even saved the day when our chef canceled last min by helping us find a new one!!

We hosted our meetings in the living room and easily had 15 people watching a PowerPoint presentation at any one time. The hosts were great - actually VERY accommodating to our group and the check-in and check-out process was seamless. Now, we are trying to think of reasons to have another meeting in Hood River, so we can return to Lodge 902. Highly Recommend!!
This 1-room studio is fine for a few days. Brooke provides the necessities and a few extras. Clean. Private entrance and quiet but short driving distance from town and the river activities.
Very comfortable and clean place to stay, highly recommended!
We had a great stay! Nice place and friendly hosts.

Brooke's space is close to everything but far enough away that you feel the peaceful quiet away from town. Everything is spotless, convenient and comfortable. She's a delightful host with great recommendations.

A really great place with very thoughtful amenities. I would absolutely stay with Brooke again!

The apartment was perfect for my stay in Hood River. The space was very inviting and very close to town. The apartment had everything I needed for the stay. Very comfortable place, exactly as described. Brooke was very responsive.

Had a great time! The place was clean and easy to get into. Brooke was flexible with us on arrival time which was very much appreciated.

Brooke's place is set up as described, contains ample space, is comfortable and full of amenities, and has memorable touches like Castile soap, mint tea, and feminine products. Would highly recommend Brooke's space for anyone looking for a short and sweet getaway to Hood River.
We were in town for a wedding and our request to check in early was accommodated, which was much appreciated. We were very comfortable in the room.
Perfect place and Brooke was amazing, would stay there again given the opportunity.

Brooke and Peter's place fulfilled all my needs and more! Very clean and comfortable. Brooke is an amazing host.
Great place to stay as a jumping off point for all that Hood River has to offer. Clean, comfortable, and conveniently located :).
Had a great time in Hood River.

Brooke’s place was super clean, airy, and in a quiet location. She was friendly and quick to respond. Tall people have to be careful getting in and out of bed, but otherwise everything we needed was there and I considered it all high quality. Thanks so much!!

Brooke’s place is in a perfect location near the Columbia River Gorge, Mt. Hood area and points in Washington. The accommodations are clean and comfortable and Brooke provides suggestions for things to do and where to find various places to eat. She communicates well and has every detail covered. Would definitely return when we are in the area.
We loved staying here. Great place with plenty of room and everything we needed. Just a few mins from loads of restaurants. We’d definitely stay here again when we’re in town.

We needed a place to get ready for a wedding along the Gorge and spend one night and this place was perfect. This was a perfect place for myself. It was cozy, clean, and private with plenty of windows that provided a nice breeze.
We enjoyed our stay! Would stay again.

The space was sweet, well appointed, and welcoming. Everything was clean, the info book full of personalized information on local attractions and restaurants, and it was easy to get everywhere from there. It’s a perfect getaway for a stay in hood river!

We felt very much at home at Brooke‘s apartment … it has a cute and comfy vibe, spacious and tucked away on the second floor with trees all around … enjoyed their shade on the hot days … Brooke was a very friendly host … it was nice she lives next door … absolutely recommend her place …

Brooke's place was a perfect spot to call home during a quick visit into Hood River for a wedding. This is a very busy town during the summer, I found her place to be a great value and fairly priced for a town that gets incredibly busy during peak season. I'd gladly return for a stay!

We had a wonderful stay at Brooke's in Hood River. Brooke was very responsive and her place was clean and ready for us upon arrival. Took her recommendation and went into Bingen for the spa which was lovely. Would stay here again. Thanks!
Private, well furnished space. Very comfortable bed

The apartment was wonderful: clean, private, and in a quiet neighborhood close enough to downtown Hood River to be super convenient. Brooke was a responsive and thoughtful host. Nothing was amiss -- couldn't ask for a better experience. Thank you, Brooke!

Such lovely loft, both homey and cozy and clean and tidy. Brooke was very communicative and provided excellent restaurant recommendations. We also did a fantastic hike that we found in the provided guidebook. Highly recommend!
Great spot and super reasonably priced. Cute, clean, and functional. Backyard is very peaceful Brooke is awesome and very thoughtful in how she sets up the space. Would love to stay again!
Brooke's place was great! It was clean, comfortable, and in a good location just a short drive to the city center. Brooke was always quick to respond and flexible.

Wonderful stay at Brooke’s place in Hood River. She kindly had the perfect temperature set for us (was a hot day) and air mattress set up for kids upon our arrival. Would definitely stay again!
Brooke was great and the apartment is spacious and comfortable. Glad we stayed there and we recommend it!

Brooke was a great communicator. Clear information. The place was much larger than we expected. Very clean with new bed linen. Super close to our winery. Would recommend and stay there again. Thanks, Brooke!!
Easy no-hassle check-in, not too far from downtown, rather quiet despite being on a minor thoroughfare, nice selection of teas and coffee for breakfast. Thanks Brooke!

Such a great place to stay. Very quiet and private. Very close to downtown Hood River but in a quit peaceful neighborhood. We had everything that we needed to have a wonderful stay. Would definitely stay again on our next visit to Hood River!

Brooke is an amazing host. Her place is super easy to get to. And if you’re doing some winery stops, U-picks, and some hikes then this is a great location to be in.

Definitely recommend staying here. We will hopefully be back real soon.
The host was accommodating of our need to check in early, and the room itself was adorable. Everything went as smoothly as it could have gone, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

This spot is adorable, close to everything, and quiet. We loved every detail including the comfortable bed and the amenities. The space is beautifully appointed with great light.
