Hosts were around during our stay, and replied quickly to all requests, but respected our desire not to interact much.
Fabulous place. Has everything all set up nicely in a quiet neighborhood close to town.
Nice hosts, comfy bed!
I love this space. Simply and beautifully designed, with lovely aromatherapy touches. Less than a 10 minute drive to downtown. Brooke was the sweetest host. Very reasonably priced. Recommend!

Fantastic Airbnb with excellent amenities. Perfect location for one or two people spending a weekend in Hood River. The host was an excellent communicator and seemed very open to trying to help however she could.

Brookes studio apt is very convenient to the town of hood river. it is within close proximity to a vineyard, walking trail and supermarket. The apt. Was very clean and check in was easy. The bed was super comfy!
Perfect place for 2, great location

Very nice place to stay ! It was a quick stop but The communication with Brooke was very easy and she prepared everything for us to be comfortable !

What a perfect little place for a mother daughter overnight. Brooke’s place was nicely decorated, clean and comfortable. We loved the touch of the essential oils! Will definitely stay here again!

This place was beautiful and very clean. It was a quick drive to the downtown and waterfront area. The hosts were very communicative and provided helpful information of activities to do around the city. Highly recommend staying here if you’re in the Hood River area!

Smelled wonderful upon arrival, clean and of essential oils, possibly. Bed was so comfy and had equally as comfy pillows. We slept like rocks. The ac unit was set to the perfect temperature and was nice and cool throughout our whole stay. Owners are lovely and communicative.
Great space— nice crisp clean linens! We loved using the bikes.

I had a wonderful stay at Brooke’s place, and would definitely stay here again on my next trip to the Hood River! Her place is very spacious and I had everything I needed (and I especially appreciated the fridge and electric kettle!). Brooke also let me use a cruiser bike, which was very helpful for getting to Pine St Bakery and Kickstand. All her recommendations were great too - I loved the handmade pasta and sour cream ice cream at Celilo’s.

This place is perfect, a great location in Westside Hood River. Check in was simple and access to the unit is secure and parking is convenient. some nice landscaping touches.

The unit had everything I needed.
I enjoyed my stay and definitely stay here again.
The stay here was amazing! Communication was also great too. A perfect place to stay :)

Brookes apartment was the perfect location! Close to bike trails, parks, coffee shops and downtown hood river, as well as the river front. It was a perfect size for my mom, son, and I. A sweet little spot for exploring around the gorge!

The space is clean, open, spacious, great location to all things Hood River, quiet, and equipped with lovely products and thoughtful touches. We will definitely be back to Brooke’s location. Love this little place! 5 min drive to town and close to some awesome vineyards/wineries, bars, coffee shops, parks etc! Quiet and beautiful views out the windows. Oh, and the bed!!! Excellent hosts. I highly recommend!

Brooke’s place was perfect spot for us. It had all the comforts we needed for our stay. Brooke was great at communicating and said hi when we arrived.
In a great location to get to downtown hood river, mt. hood or the fruit loop.
Beautiful and quaint space. The extra touches, and care into the space is amazing! I will be back for sure.
Great space & location, my husband was very comfortable!

Perfect spot for a weekend getaway to hood river!

Loved our stay at Brooke’s. The apartment is lovely and had everything we needed. Close to the Hood River activities we wanted to do.

Fantastic stay that was peaceful, quiet, and very clean. Located just minutes from downtown and minutes away from great scenic drives going towards Mt. Hood. Highly recommend this place and plan on revisiting if I stay in Hood River in the future.

Very clean, comfortable and quiet. Perfect for our 2 night getaway to the Gorge!
Very clean, cute and conveniently located! Definitely would stay here again.
Comfortable and well maintained. The description was very accurate.

Spacious private clean apartment! Great communication!
What a wonderful place to stay. It is so cute and cozy, just like the photos. It is very clean and smells great too!
We had a beautiful stay. Very comfortable and clean, with great communication from the host.

Sweet place with everything you will need to relax and unwind. The space is so cute a d the cleanest place I have ever stayed.

Brooke's place was very clean & seemed more spacious than the pictures let on. Her communication was great as well. It was too hot during our stay to brave the walk into town but it was an easy drive in.

Great place. We will definitely stay again when in Hood River. The space is very nice and spacious. Great location that was easy to get to downtown or to Mt. Hood.

Very comfortable and private. Felt safe and was quiet. 👍🙏😃
Fantastic place and beautiful location. We will be planning to stay here anytime we’re in the Gorge.
This place was well-designed, clean, and very comfortable. I’d be happy to stay here in the future!

We had a great relaxing time staying in our cabin for a night after a long day of hiking. We had everything we needed and felt completely relaxed and at home in the modern space. We will likely come back for another stay! I would highly recommend Brian's place to anyone looking for a modern retreat.
The place was great. We got in a little late so we didnt get to enjoy it as much as we'd have liked to, but still a great stay. Good price for the room bad price for fees. Not the owners fault.

We loved our cabin and hope to return for sure! Fantastic design, great light, comfortable, pretty, functional, peaceful. Highly recommend! Host was so friendly and responsive. Loved the very nearby hikes and views!
Modern, clean, stylish.
This place was awesome! Beautiful windows and the heated floors in the bathroom were an extra bonus. Lovely little town and loved the proximity to Hood River. Definitely recommend!

The Randonee cabins are beautiful. It’s a
Really beautiful piece of property. The art, the furniture, the fixtures to the heated bathroom floor was all amazing. We found our selves looking out the floor to ceiling windows admiring the beautiful cabin and the landscaping. Brian is a 10 and it’s obvious he has put a lot of time and care into the cabins.
We enjoyed our stay at Brian’s cabin..
Wonderful second stay at these delightful cabins.
Great space, fun location and host is fantastic! Look forward to returning.

Outstanding! Clean, spacious, well-appointed, very comfortable cabin with a fantastic location. Attached shed for your gear is super convenient. Close to downtown Hood River, a ton of beautiful local trails, and a taco truck across the street that is excellent. Would definitely stay again!

This was my second stay in the Camp Randonnee cabins and I continue to love it here. The cabins are wonderful - well appointed and so comfortable - and the views are gorgeous. Mosier is a fun little town with easy access to hikes all around. Brian is a wonderful and responsive host. I highly recommend!
Quiet place, clean, great location and excellent host!

The Cabin was super cute, clean and a great spot for a couple's getaway! We appreciated the touches of local beverages and local art! We felt that the Cabin had all of the utensils and dishes necessary to make our meals. The location is close to the river and a quick drive into Hood River.

Quick drive from hood river and easy to get to. Very very clean! Bedding and mattress were comfortable and we slept well. Some traffic noise but we travel with a sound machine so it wasn’t a big deal, and the nice location makes this even more worth it. Nearby coffee shop is wonderful and has friendly staff. Taco truck right across the street was very good. Host is wonderful - friendly and responsive. We loved this place and we would gladly stay here again! 10/10!
Fantastic.
The cutest modern cabin that had all we needed! The space felt bigger than it was with all the amazing natural light. It had all the comforts, plus quick access to all things Gorge.
Wonderful, bright private cabins but with a community feel. Take them up on their recommendation to check out Mosier Company for food, drinks, music and meeting the locals.
This cabin is beautiful, clean and so cozy! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
We had an amazing time at Brian’s Camp Randonnee! Everything about the cabin was exactly as pictured (maybe even better!) and Brian was an excellent host. Would highly recommend booking!

What a find... we walked in to find a complimentary 6 pack of beer and a nice bottle of wine waiting for us. The place was spotless and a perfect quiet location for us to retreat after a long drive. The kitchen was stocked with coffee from the coffee shop just below the cabin. We opted to get our coffee made for us and had breakfast at the coffee shop each morning before golfing in Hood River at Eagle Crest. We want to add a shoutout to our Brian as I missed the message regarding the map misdirection and the door code being provided. He was super responsive and got back to us within minutes of us sending a message for more info.

We came down for a quick weekend getaway and Brian’s place was exactly what we needed. It was so clean, modern, and comfy. Lots of nice little touches like local coffee and beer. We got to meet the owners and they were very nice. Will def be coming back!

Nestled in the tiny town of Mosier just a few miles outside of Hood River, this modern cabin has beautiful architecture and interior finishes (though dare I say seem slightly out of place for the surrounding area, but alas super clean and comfy). Great for a short few day stay for 2 people as the cabin is a studio layout. Longer term stays you may desire a full size fridge, a washer and dryer and a microwave (though the ninja countertop oven is great and possibly does all you need). That said, everything was perfect for our 3 night stay. Cute coffee shop is steps away, along with a Mexican food truck and the MoCo restaurant that were both good. Cabin is quiet with the occasional train that passes through. The backyard deck and fire pits are cozy. Just a quick drive to get to Hood River to enjoy the river front and breweries, shops and restaurants and close to hiking trails and water activities. Perfect for the outdoor enthusiast (and the shed is perfect for storing your gear). Booking was super easy and the hosts are friendly and highly communicative (even met in person when there). Highly recommend staying here, would definitely stay again!

My husband and I took our first trip away without our kiddos and stayed at one of Brian's cabins. We were excited from the photos online, but upon arrival, we were in agreement that the photos didn't really do it justice. The cabin is simple but done well. Very cool aesthetic and fantastic location! Having the coffee shop just beyond the fire pit was amazing. We even met Brian by chance one morning grabbing coffee and got to introduce ourselves - super rad dude. He was responsive to our text messages about some questions we had, he recommended a restaurant to us to celebrate our anniversary (which we also took him up on and was fantastic!) Really great experience. We will definitely be returning again! Thanks so much for having us, Brian!
Very comfortable and pleasurable stay in these cabins. I love the whole design from interior to exterior to the excellent coffee shop in the front. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a getaway.
Awesome basecamp for exploring Columbia River gorge. Would love to stay here again

We loved our stay at Camp Randonee and we will be back! Everything about this place was wonderful and well thought out. We loved the location just beyond Hood River and access to outdoor activities. Brian was very helpful, easy to work with, and a great host.

Really appreciate how incredibly comfortable the bed was, and well laid out the entire place was, and such an inspiring design. The Ninja oven also made cooking anything seemless - and the kitchen contained everything we could ask for. Normally when we are in Hood River we eat out every night, this time we ate in every evening to enjoy the beautiful space and patio area even more. Couldn’t believe how quiet the air conditioning unit was - We appreciated having the cabin cool upon our arrival amidst a heat wave. Thank you! Complimentary beers and wine was a nice touch too - We love Pfiem!!

We loved our stay at Brian and Summer’s place! Cabin was super cute and charming, extremely clean, and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Great bay windows with a river view, cute coffee shop for morning coffee and a great little taco truck across the way for lunch. Great communication from check in to check out and everything in between. Will definitely stay here again!

We loved our stay at this great cabin! Very comfortable with a unique setting in such a sweet little town.
Brian was great to communicate with and quick to respond. Nice to actually run into him and chat for a few minutes.
We will definitely be back again!

Amazing amazing place and Brian is an awesome host.
Don’t miss the mosier plateau trail that’s walking distance from the cabin, and the rock creek beach just down the street.
Super comfy bed and gear garage was super handy.

Such a great experience! 5 mins from Hood River, literally steps to good coffee, tacos and beer and bike and hiking trails in town. The utility closets made storing our bikes super easy. The listing itself was immaculate and modern and cozy. Perfect place to come home too after a day of adventuring in the Gorge
Beautiful modern cabins in the heart of Mosier. Perfect base camp for whatever Gorge adventure you have planned.
We had an excellent stay, awesome location, clean place and so much to do around Mosier and Hood River. Also really good coffee and breakfast right next door.
Fabulous place and location. We loved Mosier and Camp Randonnée was really something special.

Absolutely the best rental!
Everything/ Every detail was thoughtful and beautiful!
Perfect😎
Great space in a quiet location.

The cabin was really pleasant. Full of light and open like a little modern loft. It's the perfect location for so many things - recreating or otherwise. We were there for a wedding that was at a farm in the hills above Hood River. Loved the local coffee, Randonee, and restaurant, Mosier Company. There was a live band when we were there and the food was very good. Of most note - we slept like babies. Finally, someone who understands the importance of a good mattress! Thanks Brian!!!

Cabin 4 is where i stayed - highly recommend it! The only negatives are the bed is more firm than i expected (not an issue, just surprising) and the motion sensitive light on the taco truck will go off in the wind, but the bed is tucked away and the blinds are solid so it's not an issue at all unless you're a night owl 🦉 The shower is awesome, the inline water heating is awesome, the space is gorgeous, and the proximity to cool stuff is great. Make sure to get a breakfast sandwich and a latte at the cafe, everything there is super good!
Brian’s place was super clean, brand new and along with the great design he equipped it with really great soaps, drinks etc… 10/10, would definitely recommend!
Great location in Mosier. Definitely check out the Mosier Plateau Trail. So close you can walk to it.
Amazing place to stay. Easy access to great coffee and food. Clean and very comfortable. We had 2 great days of biking.

We had such a lovely stay at the cabin - it was the perfect getaway. We loved the area - such a great, modern cabin in the center of Mosier with accessible hiking trails and bike riding which we took advantage of ! The welcome package was such a sweet touch. The communication was A+ !
We will be back ! Thank you Brian !
Great place very clean and cute and cozy
We had a wonderful stay in Hood river at Karey's Airbnb! The apartment had everything that we could possibly need during our visit. The location was magical and the bed was amazingly comfortable!!
It was a great stay at a beautiful location. The property and house are well-designed and extremely comfortable. Bob and Karey are great hosts and good people. We would highly recommend it.
Perfect gateway location for all things the area has to offer. Karey is very friendly and went out of her way to make sure we had a wonderful stay.

What an amazing location and view! The river is right outside is beautiful and accentuates this homey space perfectly. Listening to the river was so peaceful and the view from the porch is idyllic. The perfect spot for coffee in the morning and a glass of wine at night. The bed was comfortable and the kitchen is great for making easy meals at home. I also loved the roomy shower and cute bathroom sink feature. All in all this is a comfortable place to stay and the price can’t be beat for how lovely the surroundings are. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for some rest and quiet time, but it’s also in great spot to explore the Columbia River Gorge if you want to go out.
We enjoyed sharing kareys home on the river. We kept the windows open at night to hear the water and it was perfect!! Not too far from town, and your own nature reprieve to explore the gorge

Very peaceful back porch over looking the river. The bed was comfy. As mentioned, its right of a busy highway, I didn't notice the noise much but its not a walk-able location whatsoever if that matters to you. The apartment is attached to the main house, so the back deck is shared with the owners. You could hear them in their house in the evenings, they weren't loud, but its definitely not a private apartment if thats what you're looking for.
Everything about our stay was wonderful! The location was easy to get to, the back porch was super relaxing next to the river, the bed was comfortable and we had a nice chat with our host.

This was a gorgeous location with the river right out the back door. Excellent back porch with rocking chairs for hours of quiet reading and contemplating. There are tons of song birds and squirrels. The Oregon grape is flowering and it was a gorgeous pop of color in the early spring landscape. The bed was comfortable with soft sheets and cozy quilts—good sleep with the sound of the river. Great shower and fluffy towels. The hosts were respectful of my privacy and super responsive. There is some noise from the busy bridge nearby, but inside the room it was barely noticeable and the sound of the river drowns out a lot of it.

We had stayed here before several years ago and so it was a natural choice because of location. It is tranquil and beautiful. It is very close to Hood River and the sound of the river instills a sense of peace.
Great place a few miles outside of Hood River. We loved the porch overlooking the river. The bed was extra comfortable. Overall a great stay.
The room and the area were beautiful

We really enjoyed their place! The location was perfect and peaceful right by the river. It was very cozy. The shower in the place was beyond amazing A++++ My daughter and mom absolutely loved their stay. It's attached to the house as the listing says, but more than enough privacy, if anything they didn't get enough privacy from us haha, my daughter is a social butterfly and would walk over to them to chat and garden. They are very friendly hosts! I definitely recommend staying here. The listing says some highway noise, but from inside you won't here anything. I'm a super light sleeper and it never woke me up. You will more likely hear the soothing sound of the river. The location is perfect, just a 10 min drive to the main part of town and 30-45 min drive to the slopes depending on what part of Mt hood you're going to. Many hiking trails and waterfalls near by to see. Oh and they have mexican train dominoes!!
There is a good chance we will return in the future!
Cute little place! Great view of the river and the county store across the way was fun. Allowed us easy access to Mt. Hood skiing with a 40 minute drive. Comfortable and well decorated.

Sit in a wooden rocking chair on the back porch facing Hood River while enjoyingy your drink and good conversation. Enjoy viewing the colorful birds and the soothing sounds of rushing water. This place is not only very clean but also very nice for relaxing and escaping into nature while having all the amenities of a comfortable home. It's a great value too. We've stayed there several times and plan to return again.
It was very good space. The river noise was restful.

This is a sweet gem and the treats at the shop across the driveway are a perfect compliment. Close to the restaurants and other activities in town. Great view of the Hood River and beautiful oaks growing along the river. We hope to return soon!
Wonder place with fantastic view of Hood River. Exceptional host.
Great location! Lots of space and a beautiful view of the river. Plenty of amenities for any of our needs. Thanks, Karey!
What a great place with wonderful hosts!

My hubby and I came to town for some skiing at Timberline and couldn’t be happier to have found this charming and cozy spot for the weekend. It was very warm and peaceful, perfect after a day on the mountain.
Thank you again, Karey!
Looking forward to booking again in the future.
We had a great stay,. Loved the property, amenities, and under floor heating.

This was the perfect place to stay for a quiet weekend outside Hood River as a base camp for snowshoeing trips on Mt Hood. Clean, great location across from the Apple Market, and Karey was very responsive and kind. Highly recommend!

Fantastic view of the Hood River, a Winter wonderland at this time of year. Warm, clean, cozy private place. Kitchen fully stocked. Perfect for up to 3 people. Have booked before and will do again. Exceptional hosts.

We loved our stay with Karey and Bob. They were so sweet and helpful. We stayed here to be closer to the Hood River Hospital during a winter storm because I was 38 weeks pregnant. They made us feel right at home and offered their help several times. The place is even cuter in person. You can’t better hosts then these two in Hood River!
Loved the beauty of the place. Very Rustic and charming
Beautiful place, stars looked amazing at night! Very peaceful and relaxing!

This was our second stay at Karey's and it was wonderful each time. Very quiet and private. Cozy and comfortable. Great bed and terrific shower. This is a perfect place for a personal retreat. There is much to do and see in Hood River and area. Or you can just hunker down in this restful, beautifully designed studio. We highly recommend it!

Stay here on your next trip to Hood River!! The property is gorgeous and not too far from the amenities in Hood River. The endless amounts of outdoor recreation nearby made us wish that we booked more nights at Karey's place. Additionally, the place was spacious and super clean. Highly recommend!!

This was a nice place that met my needs for a short stay in the area. I met Bob at check-in and he was welcoming and helpful with local recommendations.
The kitchen had all the things I needed to make meals.
One negative was that some of the surfaces were not clean. Dusty table tops in the living area, and lots of crumbs under the toaster on the kitchen counter.
Overall, I liked my stay at this cozy spot.

I loved my stay at Karey’s place! It was so cute and comfortable. The surroundings were so beautiful, quiet, and peaceful. There is the cutest little country store right next to them that had delicious ice cream and goodies. Only a 15 minute drive to the city center with lots of window shops, restaurants, winery tasting rooms, and breweries. And 10-15 minutes in other directions away from the city center we’re beautiful winery estates. I didn’t mind the driving either when it’s all beautiful to look at. And Karey was very kind and made the stay there very easy and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again 😊

We had a wonderful and relaxing stay at Karey’s. It was a bit too cold to enjoy coffee on the porch in October, but the set up was comfortable and cozy. We were close to town, but still near nature with the sound of the river just outside the back door. Would definitely stay again on a future getaway.
Perfect spot to come back to after a long day of apple picking! The porch was so relaxing and the view was amazing!!
The cabin was so comfortable and “Oregonian”, much larger than photos seemed. Morning coffee on the deck overlooking the stream was so reflective and relaxing. Thank you.💋
Great accommodations for our quick stop!
Host was very friendly and helpful. Accommodation was clean and the views were fantastic. Would not hesitate to book again .
Peaceful and cozy space for two. Very private even though it is attached to the main house. Has everything you need for a weekend getaway!

Karey and Bob are excellent hosts.
Karey is very responsive.
Their home is great, with a well equipped kitchen.
The porch by the river is amazing.
would definitely come back!

Our first time in the Hood River area and what a great place to visit. Karey was a great help with ideas for dining and touring. The apartment was quiet, cozy and comfortable. And there is a view of the Hood River out the back.
Great place and awesome host.

Thanks for being so helpful and understanding! As parents of a toddler, we are especially grateful to have found such a nice place, and for such patient hosts. Huckleberry milkshakes just a short walk away were a big hit!
Beautiful location on the river, so peaceful. Very cozy feel and very welcoming.
Karey was an excellent host who provided over the top amenities. She was very war and friendly.The ambience of the river running in front of the porch with rocking chairs was the best...
We enjoyed our quick stay at Hood River, and would stay here again. The back porch was an especially nice, peaceful spot to land after a busy evening.

This was the perfect place for us and wished we had booked more time. It was very clean. The host were very accommodating and suggested we go to Joseph and visit and it was well worth it. We will book this again but for more days
Reasonable price and perfect for our weekend stay as a family of 3. We had everything we needed and felt comfortable and safe.

We enjoyed our time very much. The apartment is very clean and comfortable. The porch on the back is very peaceful. We enjoyed the Fruitloop trail and observing people at the Columbia river. We have never been to the area and found it to be a great find.
Family stay, welcoming and caring hosts. The accommodation is easily accessible, comfortable, clean, quiet and beautiful surroundings.
Karey's place was wonderful. She was very responsive and helpful during our stay. We enjoyed sitting out on the back porch with the river literally right there in the backyard.
Very welcoming and peaceful stay, thank you!

Karey and Bob were fabulous host. The bed was comfortable it had everything we needed and a cute little market on the corner which sells the best dill mustard! But nothing compares to the porch view we sat there for hours just relaxing and listening to the river flow by. Spectacular!
Our stay was peaceful, the river was beautiful and the bed very comfy!
We loved the back porch, overlooking the river!
Beautiful location with a great back porch just about Hood River. The home is comfy and inviting. This is my 2nd stay here and I look forward to my 3rd stay next month
We enjoyed our time at this space, very nice view of the river.

We will definitely be staying here again! Perfect place for a peaceful getaway. Beautiful surroundings, a back porch with rocking chairs to relax in while gazing at the trees and the river below. Clean and comfortable and inviting!
We had a very nice stay at Karey’s lovely airbnb. It’s in a great location, it’s really cute and comfortable with a peaceful view right on the river. We will look forward to next time.
We loved staying with Karey and will definitely come back if we travel to Hood River again.
Our stay here was great! We had our privacy and a beautiful town to spend the night in! Would definitely recommend! A great point to travel to Portland or nearby state parks from!

Wow what an awesome place to stay! We only wish we had booked it for longer. Such a great place - cozy & peaceful. Cute little country gift store right across the lane. Close to Mt. Hood and hood River. The porch was wonderful to sip coffee and take in the sights & sounds of the river. Karey and her husband were so nice. Would love to come back again one day! I forgot a battery charger and Karey notified me within 5-10 minutes of our departure offering to ship it to my home. But we had not traveled far so we turned around to retrieve it. I was so grateful that she notified us so quickly. Highly recommend if traveling to this area.

Stellar location and hosts!
From sleeping with the peaceful sound of Hood River to enjoying our morning coffee on the porch with the river view, Karey's location is tough to beat and they were very responsive hosts.
We look forward to staying there again!
Karey’s cozy location added to a fantastic stay in Hood River. Everything was as described in this quiet location not far from town. We felt at home.

I wish we had been able to stay longer. We had to get back home and this was just a stopover. But such a soothing, beautiful space to help us rest our road weary bones. Clean, restful, lovely space. I hope we can come back sometime in the future.
Family members stayed at this lovely spot of Karey’s right along the Hood River during my wedding weekend. They really enjoyed their stay and Karey was very helpful and accommodating. Thanks Karey!
Karey was a wonderful host and we loved her place!

Amazing location! You can sit on the patio and watch the river. It's just a 10 minute drive to the town of Hood River. The place was very comfortable and clean. This was one of our favorite Airbnbs that we have been to.
Great house with all we needed for the short stay. Definitely recommend!
Karey & Bob we’re a pleasure! They were friendly and their place was perfectly described.

Karey was an excellent host as all details were explained and identified and everything was just as described and even better. The location was ideal for us, only 10 minutes to our meeting place. The river was just below the back porch to make a beautiful backdrop and the sound of current was evident. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom and shower clean . We talked to the hosts at the time of departure and they were delightful.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Karey’s place. I’d highly recommend it to anyone who wants a clean, peaceful place to stay right by the river!
Sitting on the back porch watching and hearing the river flow was so relaxing.
We stayed here while we were in town for a wedding. This was a beautiful and relaxing place to rest. We loved the list of restaurant recommendations they had as well!

Karey’s place was a wonderful getaway. We were not there much, but enjoyed sitting on the deck listening to the sound of the river. It was very relaxing. The bed was super comfortable, and we slept great. The location was an easy drive into downtown Hood River for dinner. We’d stay again!

This is the perfect place to stay in the Hood River area. It's a great location, close to town but very private in a lovely, wooded setting on the river. The apartment is comfortable and nicely set up. Karen and Bob are great hosts.

We have stayedmultiple times and this last visit was just as great as the others! Hosts were very kind and attentive to anything we needed. Lovely setting, beautiful view of the river with an array of sing birds to sooth the soul! Would highly recommend and will stay again!
A perfect stay!
Great place, quiet, peaceful river, and the owners were nice.
This cabin by the river was a great find. It was easy to find, close to the town yet tucked away in a quiet and peaceful location. Had a relaxing stay here.

My daughter and I fully enjoyed our stay! The place was just as pictured and we felt at home. The view of the river was lovely and peaceful. We sat on the deck to admire it while drinking our marionberry shakes from the country store at the end of the drive. ❤️

What a beautiful stay in Hood River! Only 10-15 minutes from downtown and the drive is beautiful through many vineyards and orchards! Karey was a generous host, even purchasing a Pack n Play for our baby to sleep in!! We would return in a heartbeat. Thank you, Karey!

This creatively designed apartment is spacious and very well set up. It was a joy to look at some of the hand made furniture that adorned the apartment and the deck. Having access to a laundry room was a nice bonus. I would have been very comfortable in the cabin apartment if I had stayed longer than my short time in Hood River.
I could easily prepare meals in the kitchenette and then enjoy them while watching the lovely Hood River that flows in front of the cabin. When I left one of the windows open, I could hear the sound of the river throughout the cabin.
In April, orchards in full bloom and trails along the Columbia with lots of wildflowers are just a short drive away from the cabin.
Karey was super welcoming and had wonderful communication with me. Both Karey and Bob shared lots of ideas for getting out in the area during my stay.
This is a place that I would be glad to return to in the future.
Great simple spot. The river front porch was nice.
Karey’s apartment is a lovely spot to stay in! Comfortable inside and out, with lots of charming touches. Would definitely return sometime.

This wonderful home away from home overlooking the roaring Hood River is one of our favorite vacation places to hang our hats . Situated in the beautiful Hood River Valley, we find ourselves returning again and again to enjoy the hospitality of our delightful hosts, Bob and Karey, and the comfortable, well appointed vacation home they have created. If the weather permits, sit outside with your glass of wine and enjoy the peacefulness of your natural surroundings. The kitchen accommodates simple food preparation, the table seats dining for two, the bath towels are plush and the bed is so very comfortable. Don’t hesitate to choose this lovely Northwest cabin.
Thank you Bob and Karey for graciously hosting us every time we visit Hood River.
Easy stay, had everything we needed. Good communication.
Their place was perfect for our needs!! It is close to our daughter’s place. It’s also ideal and restful! We’ll certainly come back in the future!!
Thanks for having us!

Karey was a great host! She was friendly and very welcoming. She made a point to greet us and told us several times to let her know if we need anything. House was spotless and bed was comfy! Unfortunately our schedule allowed us only one night there, otherwise we would have loved to stay for multiple nights. Will plan to stay here again in the future!

Karey’s place is gorgeous, quiet and spacious, It sits above the Hood River which you can rest in the hammock and watch and listen to along with the birds, heaven. The kitchen wa super well appointed. I love the drive from her place into town and or up the mountain through miles of orchards. This was a dream stay.

The price was great great for a what you got. Lots of room, clean, very nice. It only has a kitchenette, but it is a much better than a comparable priced hotel room, or even a more expensive room for that matter. It’s setting is very pretty and relaxed. Great place to go enjoy the local area and what it had to offer.

Lovely little apartment right on the River that was quiet and restful. Hosts were great and even went above and beyond to return an item we left during our stay. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again.
The cabin was perfect, and both Bob and Karey are awesome. Highly recommend.

We were delighted with the charm and location of the cabin. It overlooked the beautiful Hood River! The kitchen was well supplied; it would have been easy to prepare a meal or just heat something up. Cleanliness was excellent! This was a stripper on our way home, a perfect place to stay!!
We loved Karey’s place! It was cozy and private with a beautiful view. We would absolutely stay again!
The place was perfect for our one- night skiing adventure on Mount Hood. It had all we needed, and was clean and fun. And the hosts made it all very easy. Thanks!

This is a beautiful and peaceful location that exceeded our expectations. My daughter especially enjoyed relaxing in the hammock overlooking the creek. It is also a straight shot into town for restaurants/shopping, although the kitchen made it easy for us to make our own meals using the convection oven, and electric griddle. The bed was super comfortable and I melted right into it after a day on the slopes! I look forward to visiting again when it summer!

Bob and Karey were lovely hosts and the space couldn’t have been more ideal. With a spacious design, comfortable bed/pillows, and the Hood River rushing by outside, your worries will drift away in the PNW breeze.
Place was great, wish we had a more time to hang out and explore the area.
Karey was a very accommodating host, would absolutely recommend staying with her!

The view and the water were the highlights. The view was right on the edge of the Hood River...included was a view of a nice arch bridge. We enjoyed sitting on the porch in the very unique rocking chairs just looking at the view and visiting. The water for drinking, showering, cooking, was spring water and was some of the best we have had in our travels. The place was nice with hardwood floors, that incredible view, a comfortable bed, and nicely done bathroom and a fairly well stocked kitchen. It wasn't that far from a busy highway but the river drowned out the sounds of the vehicles. Karey was very responsive to any needs we had. What worked best was simply knocking on her door which was just at the other end of the porch or on the other side of the shared laundry room. Messaging through the Airbnb app was effective too. This place was about 10 min from groceries in Hood River to the north and not that far from a nice view of the Mountain and some nice hiking trails to the south.

Great couples spot for "home-base" with so much close by to explore and venture around. Tons of great brochures and local information for recommendations right on the counter as you enter in. Love the structure and design of the space with beautiful scenery surrounding the property.
We really enjoyed our stay here. They are both great hosts, and the apartment is lovely. It’s within 5 1/2 miles from downtown Hood River with an easy drive.
Good place to stay for a short visit to lovely Hood River Valley. Convenient access to Mt Hood and Hood River. Cool setting right above the river. Quiet and comfortable.
Just what we were hoping for.

Comfortable. Peaceful. Plenty of space. Sound of river at night was nice. Karey was very clear with instructions and timely communications. As a musician, I appreciated the cigar box and lunch box guitars and some of the musical themed pics. jv
This was a comfortable, clean and well equipped place in a great location.

Very nice out of the way spot on Hood River, private, warm, cosy and had all the basics. It ended up being on the cold side of things, so we didn't get to enjoy the gorgeous deck. Everything was great, in retrospect, wish we had gotten a place a bit closer in just because food was hard to find at the late time we checked in, no fault of the host though!!
This is a lovely safe place to stay!
Wish I could stay on a vacation vs a work trip!
Very relaxing place! Really loved the sound of the river right out the back door.

Karey’s place was perfect for our one night stay in Hood River. Very clean and well-equipped space. The bathroom had plenty of nice towels and quality shampoo/condition/etc. The bed and futon were comfortable as well. Best place I found for the price!

Awesome place!!! Super comfortable for 2 people, Karey made it feel like home. Maybe the only thing (which is a super big nitpick) is the saucepan was a little small to cook for 2 people, but other than that extremely minute detail everything was perfect. Highly recommend!!!!
We loved the place 🤗 it felt a small home away from home! We even want to model the shower like theirs! Amazing stay! And the river view is peaceful

Karey’s place was spacious, clean, and cozy. It was easily accessible. Karey’s instructions were perfect. The kitchenette area had everything I needed to prepare a few small meals - microwave, toaster, toaster oven, hot plate, and utensils. The rush of the river just below the back yard was especially enjoyable, peaceful, and relaxing. Karey and her husband were super friendly and even helped me find lodging for an additional night (their place was booked). I hope to stay at Karey’s again and highly recommend it for your stay in Hood River.
Awesome spot super nice place lots of space and had everything we needed
Good host. Good place

Theses folks are simply AWESOME. They even ordered a snow storm for our anniversary stay (They denied having anything to woth the snow storm, but they are Super Hosts, cabable of most anything). The river setting is simply magnificent.

Karey was the greatest host and greeted us shortly after our arrival. She and her husband were very accomidating and gracious and the cabin felt very cozy, warm, and peaceful. A must stay in my opinion.

My wife and I had a wonderful weekend in Hood River largely thanks to Karey’s lovely place. Easy to find, check in and out were a breeze, and it had all the amenities we could need. Highly recommend staying here for a relaxing time in beautiful Hood River.

This is a wonderful Airbnb. Extremely comfortable. The setting is beautiful above the Hood River. Very quiet and private. And readers will love the lighting for hunkering down with a good book. This is important! Very comfortable bed and linens. We hope to stay there again!

We really enjoyed Karey's place, and hope to stay here again! It feels like a family cabin you'd return to year after year. Wonderful hot shower, cozy home that holds in the warmth even when it's very cold outside, bright stars, and sounds of rushing water from the river just behind the cabin. We'd love to see it in the summer time, and get to enjoy the deck and hammock. It's a little ways from the main part of the town of Hood River, but we didn't mind that--it's very peaceful. We stayed here after a week on the road, and it was so nice to be able to do a load of laundry.
Thank you for the stay , it’s was wonderful , clean and easy to locate .

Comfortable, clean and peaceful with a beautiful river view. Nice TV and well stocked kitchen and bathroom. Comfortable bed. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to stay there again. Awesome hosts, great communication! Much appreciated.
Karey was very flexible with us when we had an unforseen issue that prevented us from being able to make our reservation. Much appreciated!
This place is lovely, quiet and secluded. A perfect jump off to go hiking or drive to shop and enjoy. Very thankful we stayed here fall is beautiful.
I had a great stay at Karey's place. It was too chilly to be out on the porch while I was there, but I can see it being an amazing place to hang out!
This place was just what we were looking for: close to Hood River, cute and comfortable, and an easy check-in process. Thanks Karey!

Worked great for a one night trip. Beautiful location and not too far from town and other attractions. Definitely make a stop a WAAAM just around the corner, it was a great way to spend a rainy afternoon.
This was a great location along the river. Very neat, clean and comfortable. Loved the back porch and view. We had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again!
Very clean and very quiet. Seemed to have everything you would need for a short stay.
Wonderful and cozy place for our birthday weekend away. We’ll definitely be back.

Our stay at this beautiful apartment was out of this world! The setting was idyllic, the amenities were perfect and our hosts were so very lovely! We wished we would have booked an entire week!
Our hosts were so available, and offered to provide us with anything we might need.
The rocking chairs on the deck, that overlooked the River, were so comfortable and inviting. We would wholeheartedly recommend this property. Plus, the bed was divine!!!

Very clean, comfortable and spacious. Quiet and safe. Private entrance.
Had some coffee, cream & sugar available, so if you needed it, you wouldn’t have to run out and get some right away. The shower was very nice.
Only downside was if you wanted to use the hot plate, it took a long time to heat up.
Definitely worth a return trip! Fabulous!
My husband and I loved this little Airbnb! They were great at communicating and very kind. Would definitely recommend this place!
Lovely location. Very clean!

Karey and Bob’s place is stunning. The hammock is the best place to start and finish your day. Bring your coffee—they’ve got a coffee maker there! No better place to sit and enjoy your morning coffee than on the shared patio. Bed is very comfortable and the towels are super soft!
Great place to stay for Columbia River Gorge and the fruit loop and wineries. Comfortable and a nice back porch with the sound of the river. The Apple store close by has great baked goods:)

Beautiful place, just as listed and as others have described. I really appreciate the owners' disclosure about traffic noise. It abated to a trickle after "rush" hours and was hardly audible when inside the apartment. Fantastic setting and gracious hosts.

The studio apartment was very roomy, homey, but tastefully furnished, and sparkling clean. We only wished we had a whole week there to really enjoy the location and amenities. The best surprise was the deck overlooking the Hood River. There is nothing between you and the river but the wooded river bank! Plus rockers and a hammock to use.
Karey is a wonderful host, providing privacy but generously sharing her home. Check-in and communication was easy and trusting. I highly recommend a stay with her.

What a cozy, charming and comfortable stay ! Karey was very communicative. We absolutely enjoyed the backyard that faced the river. Clean property and comfortable bed ! We highly recommend this property for your stay.

If you want a laid-back atmosphere, this is the place. We felt so relaxed and absolutely loved sitting on the deck, drinking coffee, and listening to Hood River pass by. It is stocked with everything you need and is a comfortable, spacious area. We would definitely stay here again.

We loved our stay at Kerri‘s apartment. The unit is beautiful and very well appointed. The kitchen had everything we needed and the open floor plan felt spacious and airy. Our favorite part, of course, was the back porch that overlooks the lovely Hood River. We spent a good portion of our time in the rockers and the hammock listening to the soothing sounds of the river. The unit was also perfectly located For our trips into town and for exploring the plethora of wineries, cideries and fruit stands in the area. We highly recommend this rental to anyone who wants to visit this lovely part of Oregon and we look forward to a return visit next time we are in the area.

Airbnb was as pictured. Plenty of space and nicely stocked kitchen. Really enjoyed the deck and sitting overlooking the river. There is some traffic noise while on the deck but very quiet inside. Karey kept us informed and responded quickly. This apartment is attached to their home but your privacy is respected. We didn’t even see them once, which was too bad because I’m sure they are lovely people. We would stay here again.
Wonderful spot, very clean, comfortable bed, relaxing environment, enjoyed the porch overlooking the river. Would stay again!
Very spacious and good value just a bit too dark outside when arriving to check in.
What an adorable place! We loved it! And definitely eat at their son's BBQ restaurant in nearby Parkdale.

LOCATION: Perfect for exploring Columbia River Gorge and Mount Hood. Easy to find and close to Hood River amenities.
APARTMENT: Very clean and comfortable. Décor is ‘rustic’, but finished to a very high standard. Kitchen is very well equipped. There is no cooker, but the microwave/hotplate/mini oven are more than sufficient. Lovely outside area, overlooking the river. Very comfortable bed for a great night’s sleep. Photos do not do the apartment justice.
SERVICE: The pre-arrival communications were very clear and helpful. It was easy to get into the apartment. We met Karey’s partner and we had a pleasant quick chat. We knew they were around if needed, but they didn’t bother us. You can tell Karey has really thought about her guest’s needs when setting up the apartment. Lots of information on local attractions.
WOULD I STAY AGAIN? For sure!

Absolutely loved the place! Great view of the river and the bridge right from the back door or the awesome hammock and rocking chairs on the porch. Sadly only stayed one night and were very busy with a wedding, but we already have talked about coming back another time to enjoy spending more time there! The bed was extremely comfy, and that mountain spring water was delicious!

Karey’s place was perfect! We booked it for a one night stay for a friend’s wedding near by and it was even better than the pictures show. Very clean and spacious and right on the river so you can hear it with the windows open. Communication with Karey was also very easy and accurate. Bed was very comfortable and space was very quiet. My only con was that we woke up to the smell of bacon but yet didn’t have any ourselves! Would recommend if you love sitting outside in the morning in peace while you sip coffee.

A perfect place to stay when visiting Hood River! It was clean, quiet, and close enough to town. Our favorite part of the trip was being able to sit on the porch and drink a cup of coffee while listening to the river. Not knowing the area, we loved having a basket of brochures on the counter for local activities and a suggestion list of places to eat!
clean and cozy room. friendly and helpful host. we enjoyed our stay

Perfect location between downtown and many of the local orchards and wineries. Karey's place is spacious and charming. We really enjoyed resting in the hammock out back! The house is also right across from the Apple Valley Country Store, which has some amazing pies.
Wonderful quaint & clean apartment. We loved sitting outside with our coffee every morning over looking the river. And every evening having our wine. Karey was very helpful & welcoming.

If your looking for a perfect place to stay right in hood river look no further. Bob and Karey were extremely friendly and welcoming! We will definitely reserve this location again the next time we’re in Hood River
Wonderful people on a beautiful property. The hosts were responsive and more than accommodating. We got to chat with the hosts a few times and they are certainly inspiring and humble people.
Perfect place by the river. Be aware there is no air conditioning but there is a fan.
Beautiful spot by the river, the back porch was the place to be, swaying on the hammock reading a book.

Karey’s place was perfect! My husband and I were in town for a wedding and her place was the perfect location. We enjoyed having our morning coffee on the porch overlooking the hood river. We even took the trail down to the river and jumped in to cool off. Karey and her husband Bob were so welcoming and wonderful to communicate with! It was a beautiful getaway and we would definitely recommend to others!
Definitely would stay here again. A real cool spot. Wish we had stayed longer!
Super cute studio style apartment. kept very clean and amazing backyard views of the river . Would def stay again .

this was a comfortable stay in a nice location. I failed to note there is no air conditioning and we arrived when it was quite warm. opening the windows and a fan helped a lot. the river is very pretty and the host was very kind and friendly. very convenient location not far from town. very cute store out front. wish we had left more time to explore the area.

10/10, will book again.
The place was great and had all amenities advertised. Porch was a huge plus and very relaxing. The location was close to both Mount Hood and Hood River. The hosts were friendly and happy to share their extensive knowledge of the area.
Excellent stay, very pleased with the accommodations

Great cabin away from town, which led to us thinking of eating and visiting Parkdale…which we LOVED! Away from the crowds, beautiful drive with views of Mount Hood. The cabin had everything we needed and Bob and Karey are very nice and helpful. We will stay again!
Absolutely gorgeous place! So clean and inviting. Lovely location. Highly recommend!

We loved this cute, well equipped and comfy studio. It was more spacious than the photos and the hosts were friendly and helpful. Make sure to pop into the Apple Valley store which is just steps away.
Tranquil and beautiful spot in one of the most gorgeous locations. Loved the hospitality and the amenities.
sitting on the veranda
Karey’s place was awesome! Affordably priced with an awesome view of the river. Would definitely book again!

Karey’s place was perfect for our quick stay in Hood River. I don’t think the photos do this home justice. The views from the porch are beautiful and the sounds of the river are relaxing. Very clean and bigger than I expected.

Beautiful spacious private area in cabin with porch overlooking the river. Loved relaxing in the rocking chairs and hammock in the evening/morning. Nicely equipped kitchen (but didn’t use during our 1 night stay). No A/C but with open windows and fan, it felt cool enough and we slept well. I am a light sleeper and was worried about outside noise/light with windows open but it was very dark and quiet outside. Able to do a small load of laundry which was nice after a few days on the road. Wish we had been able to stay longer. Would definitely stay again if in the area.

Nice, spacious, one room efficiency, attached to the main house. Private entrance on the Hood River.
Just about 5 miles from main Hood River, easy access to town, the Fruit Loop, and great ice cream at the Apple Valley Store.
There is no A/C which is not a problem unless it gets over 95 and 105! Which it did.

We had an amazing stay! The apartment is very spacious and comfortable with a beautiful view on the back deck. Location is great with quick and easy access to town and hiking trails. Karey was kind and gave us some wonderful recommendations for things to do in the area. We wouldn’t hesitate to visit again.
Very peaceful location and super clean space! The apartment unit seemed much bigger than what was expected from the photos. Would definitely consider staying again if in the area!
Beautiful location and loved the view of the river from the hammock!
super stay, super views and super hosts!

Wonderful spot in Hood River
Away from the hustle of the small town and cool breeze from the river on a hot day was a plus
Highly recommend staying with Karey on your travels to Hood River.
Lovely guest suite with everything we needed, and a quick (10-15 min) drive from downtown Hood River. Comfortable and quite; more spacious than we expected. Would definitely stay here again
I had a lovely brief stay while in Hood River for a wedding. It was peaceful and comfortable. Would stay again.

If you are looking to stay around Mt Hood then you need to stay here! The place is clean and very large. Sitting in the rocking chairs overlooking the river was a great way to start and end the days. Close to everything in the area. Has everything you could need for your stay. Shower was great with lots of hot water and the bed was super comfy. Loved it and would want to go back!
Karey's place is in a great location. it was the perfect place to stay while we were in Hood River for a wedding.
Great view. Had a wonderful stay.

Our second, and longer, stay at Karey’s roomy, comfortable, and we’ll-equipped studio was even better than our first. Our young grandkids are close by, and after a sometimes all-day visit with them or a long walk/hike while exploring the local terrain it was the perfect place for a refreshing respite - and right on the river, just as advertised. Hope to return again and again.
Great location, communication, and value!
Enjoyed my stay! The house backs up to Hood River and has a great view from the back deck! Definitely recommend.

Karey’s place is gorgeous! It is the perfect apartment space to use with anything you need and lots of charming touches. The back porch view is phenomenal as it overlooks the river and has a hammock and chairs to enjoy the space. Really lovely stay!
This place was so cute, clean, and perfectly located! Karey was so responsive too.

Enjoyed our stay in this great little apt. Comfy bed, nice shower and good overall setup. Loved the little country store right next door. River was right at property's edge. We would definitely return here.
Reviews are totally accurate, this is a lovely place to stay. If you're a light sleeper bring a sleep-mask and earplugs. Otherwise there's nothing not to love.

The airbnb was beautiful, clean, welcoming and as described. Karey was very responsive to my questions (e.g. I am allergic to feathers: are there alternatives to the down comforter - not an issue, not used in the summer) and understanding when our plans changed from two nights to one. My only complaint is that we didn't have enough time there to enjoy it as fully as we might have: I would have preferred changing from one night to two but our other plans didn't allow for that. The hammock, especially, with the sound of the Hood River rushing by, was a perfect spot for a few moments meditation and relaxation. I really, really hope to be back.
Beautiful, clean, Airbnb space.

Karry’s place was wonderful for our stay. It was very quiet and comfortable. It had everything we needed, and it was close to a lot of bars and restaurants in hood river. I would highly recommend staying here. We would love to come again.
Lovely place right on a roaring river not too far from the scenic Columbia River Gorge. Wish the weather had been a tad warmer so we could really enjoy the outdoor hammock.
wow, wow, wow! what a gem! Definitely recommend if staying in Hood River. We even stayed an extra night because we loved it so much.

Great location on outskirts of Hood River, with easy access to town, byways and highways. Super hosts, available if needed. We had no issues at all. Comfortable outdoor seating with outstanding view of river. We'd choose again to stay!
absolutely wonderful space. one of the best places sit and have cock while you're listening to the river.
Great location. The owners are very accommodating. There is a wonderful view of the river from the back deck.

I had a wonderful stay at Karey's home in Hood River. It was incredibly beautiful, right by the river, and very lovely inside with plenty of space. The hosts were very responsive and friendly as well.
WiFi worked great; I was able to connect and do work without issue!
Strongly recommend this spot to anyone who has the chance to visit Hood River!
Beautiful scenery around the location. Place was very clean and everything was described. Great communication from the hosts. Would love to stay there again. Would recommend.
Wonderful spot and home! Would recommend!

Patricia was an incredible host to my parents! She was kind, very responsive and accommodating. The view is spectacular and the cottage is so cosy with everything you’d ever need. It was even better than expected. We will definitely stay again!
The place was beautiful! We had a great stay and would happily return!
What a Magical, peaceful place. The view of Mt Hood is even better than the photos on the web site. The place is cozy and comfortable (and very clean). Patricia was a very gracious host.

This property is in a beautiful location. We enjoyed our morning coffee on the private patio with a view of Mt Hood as the sun was rising. Also, all the birds! We enjoyed watching all of the hummingbirds dive in and around. Lots to do in the area. We took advantage of several hikes and a wine tasting at nearby Hawkins winery. Also had several nice meals out including pizza night at the White Salmon Bakery. All in all a great three night getaway and we hope to return soon.
Amazing place with an amazing view! Hosts were great. Hopefully we make it back to stay again.
This is a really special place. The photos really don’t do it justice. One of my favorite Airbnbs. Hope to be back!

Absolutely incredible location. The views are stunning - even better than the pictures! Patricia's guest home was well-equipped, clean, and comfortable. The space was just the right size for a relaxing getaway for two. The location is fairly private. The bed was very comfortable - we slept like babies. The shower has good water pressure. Patricia was an excellent host - very friendly, proactive, and responsive. We can't wait to come back!

Unfortunately, wildfires blocked the views of the gorge for our first couple of days staying here. But, that may have made that view even more special once clearing! The hummingbirds (and other birds) are bonus. Patricia’s place is very clean and tidy. As described/shown, the kitchen is small and limited, but we felt the sacrifice was worth it for those views. Highly recommend for 2 people!
What an incredible location. We've stayed in many airbnbs in the Columbia Gorge, and this is our new favorite!
Lovely, private studio with awesome views. Better than the pictures.
We had a wonderful time at this amazing spot. Highly recommend!

We enjoyed one night out of our planned 3 nights at Patricia's place. Unfortunately our trip was cut short due to a major wildfire in the area and we were asked to evacuate. However Patricia was extremely kind and refunded back the entire stay. The AirBnb that Patricia built is truly a labor of love with great views, cute garden spaces and access to a lot of beautiful nature. I wish Patricia and family all the best and hope they are able to recover from the devastating impact of the fire. Thank you for letting us share your beautiful home with us.
Amazing view!

Cant say enough about this place. Most beautiful view I’ve ever seen, affordable, just a few minutes away from amazing hikes, restaurants, breweries, etc. The host is incredibly accommodating and made our experience great. The place had every amenity you could think of. If I’m in the area again I will certainly be looking to stay here.
Patricia’s place is stunning! The most gorgeous view of any Airbnb I have stayed in. Beautiful outdoor space for breakfast and dinners. We really enjoyed watching the sunsets. Highly recommend!!

AMAZING views right from the patio and from the main windows! You’re surrounded. Lovely landscaping and tons of wildlife to keep you entertained like chipmunks and birds. The inside is very clean and has all you need. The one issue is that the internet isn’t the greatest. You may have to hotspot the to your phone if you’re trying to stream something from a laptop for example. Either way this is a very peaceful place to stay.

Patricia was great and the location has amazing views. The pictures don’t come close to how amazing it is. Spent most of the trip just hanging out on the back porch. I will definitely come back and stay again.

Wonderful stay! Kind but unobtrusive hosts.
Nature nature nature! Saw wild turkeys, birds of prey, birds and hummers at their feeders and butterflies.
It just doesn’t get better than gazing at Mt Hood throughout the day!
The unit is clean well stocked and bed is comfortable with nice linens
Highly recommend and I will definitely return!

What a spectacular retreat!! The views are phenomenal, and our hosts thought of everything to make the guest house a perfect home away from home. I can’t say enough about what a memorable stay we had!

We had a wonderful stay at Patricia's guest house!! The views are unbelievable and the unit was very comfortable and well appointed. It is only a short drive to the town of Hood River, where we spent a lot of our time. Be sure to check out the great pamphlets and books on the area that she has in the unit!
This Airbnb is the most relaxing retreat. I cannot imagine a better view anywhere in the world. Patricia and her husband are very kind. I cannot recommend this place high enough.

I truly cannot say enough great things about this AirBnB and Patricia. This AirBnB is conveniently located about an hour from Portland, right across the river from Hood River, OR and minutes away from White Salmon, WA (great pizza spot and baking company!) and some great little wineries. Easy to get to with detailed check-in instructions and tons of information provided about the area. Patricia was extremely communicative, and we even got to meet her for a few minutes and she was lovely. The view is absolutely amazing! You will definitely want to spend some time on the patio having breakfast or dinner. Would definitely recommend this property to anyone, and we hope to make it back sometime!
Absolutely amazing stay. The best Airbnb I’ve ever been to. Nice private entry to a well equipped newer build guest house. Amazing view! Close enough to town for easy access to dinner and activities.

This is was a top top stay for me at any Airbnb anywhere! Was nicely built, very clean, cozily furnished, and a perfect base for Hood River exploration, especially to then come home in the evening and watch the sun set over an epic view with a glass of wine in hand. The premise, the views, and owner (I spoke with Patricia) are all just lovely.
The view is fabulous, the birds entertaining, spotless place, everything you need. Great hosts...highly recommend!
Beautiful stay!! Could not say enough about the property and host, had an amazing time
Absolutely loved this place. So charming and with the most magical view over the gorge. Would recommend and will definitely come back.

What a magical place! Patti and Mike are gracious hosts who have thought of everything in this spacious, immaculate, and well-appointed studio. They even arranged for a "super moon" to appear on the night of our arrival (lol). Seriously, the accommodations, the gardens, and the views of the Columbia Gorge and Mt. Hood are stunning. We brought astronomy binoculars and spent every evening on the terrace gazing at the stars. The bird action is also remarkable, from the smallest hummingbirds to raptors close enough to hear their wings flap overhead. You'll also want to bring some prepared meals with you, because the best restaurant in the world can't compete with the views. (We read ahead of time that there wasn't a stovetop, but there's a microwave, fridge, and everything else you might possibly need so it's easy enough to plan ahead.) We will absolutely be back.

We had an amazing stay at Patricia's cottage. It was the perfect setting for a complete reset from work and life in the city — unplugged, read, wrote, drew.
The views are breathtaking: waking up to Mount Hood, ejoying bruch on the patio overlooking the Columbia, playing cards at the dining table as birds party at the feeders, and stopping mid-conversation as a bald eagle floats by.
Patti is a wonderful host — welcoming and helpful. The cottage is lovely...
Great touches include a sound machine, comfortable bed, two separate luggage racks and hanging spaces in the foyer area, and a well-curated selection of books and magazines.
We look forward to another visit.

Found this gem as I was working a couple days on the road. Pictures don’t do the view justice… it’s like a freaking painting in two directions. Patricia was very communicative and directions were easy to follow. Everything was as good as advertised. Verizon cell service worked fine, as did wi-fi. It’s essentially a studio so any more than a couple and a small child might be tough.
Property and experience overall was a delight. Hope to make it back someday when I’m not on the clock and can enjoy the town or the outdoors.
Easy check-in, comfortable house, and most of all incredible location and views! Highly recommended!

Patricia’s home is beautiful and we greatly enjoyed our time there. The space is perfect and so many great touches. The garden space and view are absolutely spectacular. We are already looking forward to our next stay.

Patricia's guest house is one of the most amazing airbnbs I've ever been to. The view is magical, absolutely stunning. cannot be beat. Patricia and her husband were very welcoming and helpful during my stay

This place is amazing!! It has everything you need for a comfortable stay and the hosts were very helpful & communicative. The hosts live on site but your area feels very private & they are respectful of your space. And of course, the views are absolutely mind blowing! Can’t beat waking up to a view of Mt Hood :)
Beautiful garden, stunning view and very comfortable, stylish accommodations. The private patio overlooking the Gorge was a highlight. We’ll be sure to book again when back in the area.

This place has got to be in the top 10 best views in the entire world! Absolutely phenomenal! Patti and Mike were incredible hosts, everything was perfect! I’ve been raving about it to everyone I know! Will be returning next year for sure!

Such a spectacular location and a perfect Airbnb for two people (or two people plus a kid). Patricia is a wonderful host and this guesthouse has everything you need plus breathtaking views. We just wish the weather cleared enough for us to fully see Mt Hood over the four days we were there! The view would’ve been amazing.
What a find! We could not get enough of the beautiful view! The guest house was super clean, it felt brand new! We will definitely be back!

Wow, the view will knock your socks off! This was one of the best stays I’ve ever had on Airbnb. The listing is very accurate but still doesn’t describe just how nice the view of Mt Hood and the Gorge are from the windows and patio. We also enjoyed watching all the birds come visit their beautiful garden and bird feeders. It’s super close to hikes and to White Salmon/Hood River. I read ahead of time that there’s only a microwave so we planned our meals to keep that in mind but otherwise, it’s fully equipped with everything you need including the world’s fluffiest towels. I highly recommend visiting and I can’t wait to come back.
Amazing view! Lovely studio and beautiful garden. Wake up to Mt. Hood!

This guest house is perfect for two to enjoy amazing views (best I have seen at any AirBNB). It is very cozy and has easy access to all of the Mt Hood, and Mt Adams hiking trails and activities. I would stay again in a heartbeat!

The best Airbnb ever!! The view is amazing and our hosts were friendly and helpful. The home itself is beautiful inside too with lots of extra touches to make for a fantastic vacation. Definitely recommend a stop here if you want to relax and enjoy the view
This is a beautiful place to stay for some rest and relaxation. We can’t wait to go back!

Thoughtfully designed and well-appointed guest house with absolutely stunning views of the Columbia Gorge. Perfect basecamp for hiking, biking and all other outdoor activities in the area. My wife and I had dinner reservations for our anniversary, but instead got the meal to go and took it back to the guest house patio to enjoy the view.

This is such a gem of the Columbia River Gorge. The view can’t be beat and the house is very clean and quaint. The beautifully manicured garden attracts lots of pretty birds and elevates the already stunning view. We highly recommend this Airbnb!!

Absolutely wonderful guesthouse with an unbelievable view of the Columbia River and Mt. Hood. We sat on the porch for hours taking in the view. The guesthouse was clean, inviting, and has everything you need. The location is perfect for exploring Hood River, Mt. Hood, Mt. Adams, and the surrounding area. Will definitely book again!

This was the most amazing place to stay. The views are breathtaking and the gardens are a delightful bonus. Patricia and Mike were kind hosts who made us feel welcomed and appreciated as guests. We highly recommend staying here for an unforgettable Gorge experience. This place exceeded our expectations and left us excited to visit again.

Renting this space was one of the best decisions of our trip to the Gorge! If we didn't have a goal to hike everyday, we would have been just as happy to stay at the Guest House to read books, watch the birds outside and look at the view. It is peaceful, clean, and is stocked with every needful thing most people would need. I've rented airbnb's around the world and this has been my favorite rental. Highest marks!
Great location!! Amazing views. Wonderful hosts!! This place reminded us of our honeymoon spot in the Isle of Skye, Scotland !
Come for the views, stay for the bird watching! This is truly a gem of the Gorge.

Thank You Patty and Mike,
We had a fabulous time at your guest house. The view was magnificent! It was like waking up with the Gods. It was just what we needed to rejuvenate and revive our spirits. Beautiful weather, Mount Hood at the edge of our bed and happy birds frolicking everywhere…A slice of Heaven.
“Rest”assured we will be back…
Terry and LuAnn

Overall, we had a great experience here! Patti and Mike were very friendly hosts. The guesthouse looks brand new and is very well stocked and organized. The view from the guesthouse is incredible, and not just because of the amazing view of the gorge and Mt. Hood - they also have a beautiful garden you can enjoy from inside or on the patio. There's not much immediately nearby aside from a few wineries, but White Salmon and Hood River are only about a 10 minute drive away, and it makes for a great home base for exploring the gorge.

Upon arrival we we’re welcomed by Patti, she and her husband were very nice and accommodating. The directions given to their place were clear and precise, their guest house was very clean, tidy and cozy, the views from the guest house were stunning where in you can see Mt. Hood on a clear sunny day. Patti would check up on us now and again which was really very thoughtful of her. I would definitely highly recommend this place.

Very clean, cozy, and an absolutely spectacular view. Close to everything the Gorge has to offer. Patricia was very helpful and responsive communicating through both the app/email. I would definitely come back and stay again!!! Highly recommend staying with Patricia.
Very good place with all the amenities

We had a great stay here! It accommodated our needs with our two little cavapoos that we needed. We were able to check in earlier than expected which we didn’t do since we had already made plans until the designated check in. We did learn the grass wasn’t able to be attended to so it was slightly overgrown and my littlest guy ended up with tumbleweed like sticks in his hair since he likes to sit a lot. The yard is not fenced in which is stated, but would have been even more ideal for our pups but we managed fine.
Mentioned they could not find garage opener but had already stated street parking if I recall. The garage seemed quite small anyway and if you parked in front of garage it blocks sidewalk.
Street parking wasn’t the best but not the worst, we parked directly across in a parking lot (which noticed others park overnight) so we could keep eye on our vehicle which worked out fine for what it was. Walking distance to Mesquitery. Would def stay again!

This house is older and in a busy neighborhood but it’s also clean, cute and comfortable. We were in town for a family party at The Ruins which is a five minute drive away. We especially liked walking over to the Indian Creek trail with our dogs-there’s an easy access point about a block away. Host was very responsive.
Cool little house, very well situated!
Great place and easy to find! Alisha was a great host!

It was already our second stay at Alisha's house. Wonderful place, spotless clean, has everything needed for living. Wonderful, helpful and very friendly host. Definitely will come back again when visiting this area again.
Interior house was cute and location was great. Walkable distance to a few restaurants. Host was responsive to an item we left behind. Thank you!

Thank you, Alisha, for such a good place to stay. The house is really good, cozy and comfortable. Has everything needed for living, with good design. It can be clearly seen that the host cares a lot about the guests and their comfort. Very clean and tidy. We even decided to book 2 more days for our next trip.

Wonderful choice. Small home, very well utilized space. Had everything we needed. Just as described. Two very friendly coffee shops less than a block away. Comfy beds with high quality linens. We really, really enjoyed it and would love to go back
Very cute house. Easy walk to downtown. Lots of cute shops and places to eat in immediate area. Beds were comfortable, house was clean. Great bakery, tap house, and plant shop right up the road.

We enjoyed our stay. People who stay here should understand that "Hood River Heights" is a noisy mixed commercial + residential area at the top of the hill on the way out of town and along the main drag to Mt. Hood area etc. During previous stays, we stayed closer in to town, and this particular house is right on a busy intersection and looks quite run down on the outside (garbage chucked into the unkempt lawn) and does not have any fence or privacy.
The inside, though, is very thoughtfully set up with comfortable beds, flat screen tv, nice cozy bedding, etc. We did find the kitchen to have basics but missing some essential items like a ladle for soup for people who actually cook here. There are some nice things to walk to, like the popular Pine Street Cafe, and a fancy dog store. Walking, otherwise, was a challenge with no sidewalks through the residential neighborhood.
Investing in the exterior or fence would help families and people with dogs feel more comfortable relaxing here.
Clean, comfortable, and convenient! Would also recommend guests visit The Mesquitery for delicious meal--

We had a very nice time in this home. Parking was easy on the street. My sister was wishing she had brought her sewing machine to shorten the curtains and shower curtain but still is a very nice place. We would choose it again if we have the opportunity!
We both really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely book again in the future. Very clean with amenities listed. Area is walkable with short drive to waterfront.
Great place, super clean, super cute & comfortable. Everything was easy. Would definitely book again. Thanks so much!
Great central location and very comfortable place with great communication.
Alisha’s place was wonderful! Made for a very comfortable stay and a great starting point for exploring the Columbia River Gorge and Mt Hood
Had something come up, so we did not get to stay overnight. The house looked exactly as advertised and there were great shops/restaurants within walking distance.
