Lovely space within a few steps of a great bakery, market, coffee and other food. Easy walk to downtown Hood River. Highly recommended.

We had a great stay at Alisha’s. Walking distance from several restaurants and shops. We walked to the Pine St. Bakery each morning for breakfast. We had great nights of sleep with the black out curtains and the really comfortable beds and bedding. While we didn’t cook at all during our stay, it looked like the kitchen was well appointed with everything you’d need. Our dog and kiddo enjoyed the yard, and we of course picked up our poop! The heating sources in the house worked great. And check in and out was really easy and convenient with the key pad. We’d definitely stay again.
Great location and spotless rental - perfect for a quick Mt. Hood or Hood River getaway for family of 4

A really quaint cottage - compact, well-decorated, comfortable and clean! A convenient location to some restaurants and our favorite Hood River bakery (Pine Street), but it is on a main road and next to some less smart buildings. It wasn't too noisy though, and felt safe enough. Overall a very nice stay.
Lovely spot for a quick trip from PDX.
Perfect place for a weekend getaway. Close to walking trails for the dogs. Really good bakery/coffee a couple blocks away. Easy commute to downtown. Would stay here again.
Cute, clean and cozy.

This is a nice little house and my wife and I would stay there again. Good amenities, including dog-friendly and two bathrooms. We try to visit Hood River frequently from our home on the Olympic Peninsula in WA. We are familiar with the Heights neighborhood and knew what the surroundings would be like going in.

We had a great time staying at Alisha’s place. The home is in a cute neighborhood close to restaurants, bars, and coffee shops, all walking distance. The home was very cute and clean, we would definitely love to stay there again on our it next trip to
Hood River!
My husband, dogs and I loved this home. It was very homey and was a perfect vibe for our quick vacation we wanted. We will definitely be staying again the next time we visit hood river.
Great location right in the Heights of Hood River. Walkable and near some of our favorite spots for food, coffee and beer. Quiet yet right in a great location.
Really enjoyed our stay. The place was spacious and loved the decor and amenities. Alisha was also very responsive and made check in seamless.
Place was very clean. Super close to a couple cute cafe’s and bakeries! Definitely would stay again!

we loved our stay! the bed was extremely comfortable and we loved all the little amenities including the fully stocked kitchen, extra large shampoo and body wash, and the little gas fireplace. the house is walking distance to some nice places including an amazing bakery and a steak restaurant.
we would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a cute and cozy place to stay in hood river :)

Alisha’s BnB was the perfect place for a long weekend away from home for 2 adults, 1 teen, 1 senior dog and 2 4-month old puppies. The BnB had all the comforts and amenities we needed to relax and enjoy Thanksgiving. It is located near coffee shops, a great pet store, a bakery and a few restaurants (though we preferred to drive to town and The Hook area for some grub). It is walking distance from an easy hiking trail that is dog friendly so we were able to enjoy the autumn sunshine and crisp cold outdoor temps too! Alisha is super responsive, friendly and flexible. We would def come back and re-book her BnB again.
Served our needs well! 5 min drive to the downtown area. The place was very clean and had lots of room. Alisha was very responsive too!

The location was great for walking to businesses, and the inside of the house was cute(I love older houses). I was nervous when I saw the yard. Unfortunately the house had not been cleaned well or much at all. The kitchen had someone else’s food left on the dish rack, fridge shelves, and sponge. The couch had noodles on it, and quite a bit of I’m not sure what between the cushions. The headboard had food on it when I went to bed. And the pillows had big wine stains under the cases. Under the bed had a square where it hadn’t been cleaned and was quite thick. I had a hard time relaxing in the house and felt lucky I was away for work most of the day. Alisha was very apologetic and easy to communicate with about the issues.
would stay there again

We really enjoyed our stay at Alisha's home. We slept great! Great kitchen for cooking. Little communication was necessary and check in was easy with a code door lock. Location was convenient and close to stores.

Enjoyed our stay at Alisha's place! Clean, comfortable, and has a sweet backyard for the pup. Street parking is easy, and the house is just a few minutes away from downtown. Alisha is a great communicator and always quick to respond. Would recommend!

This house was beautifully decorated, clean, well located. There were lots of restaurants walking distance and just a short drive to downtown. We felt so at home staying here and would love to stay again!

Cute house inside. All new! Close to one good dinner place/bar and one delicious bakery. It is 1.5 miles to walk to downtown. There are no Hubers or Lyfts in HR. Don’t drink and drive! The yard is not pretty. It needs some love. It was too spendy in my opinion.

Alisha was an awesome host! She was very easy to communicate with, left fantastic inetructions, and made the overall experience extremely easy!
The house is lovely, very quiet and with enough room for 4 people comfortably. The house is in a great location, walking distance to several restaurants and a short drive to downtown hood river.
Overall, a great place to spend a weekend and a fantastic host to help!
Loved Alisha’s place and would definitely stay here again. Great places close by and easy drive to the main downtown area. Bed were super comfy - comfortable mattress and high quality linens.
Great location! Several great restaurants within one block and everything downtown is also just a short walk
The house was clean and very cute. Good location.
Great spot. Cozy, well-appointed place in a very convenient location. I also have to give props for simple, easy clean-up instructions—it made our final morning a synch.
Great quiet stay, especially for a work trip. Clear directions and information about location, parking, and inside amenities. Immediately response to messages, and overall great host!
great location, walking distance to coffee and restaurants . space was cozy , roomy and very comfortable, would definitely stay again
Great spot a short walk from breakfast at Pine St. Spotless and spacious.
The host was great. Very good communicator providing easy to follow instructions.

Lovely home, comfortable beds, great AC during a very hot stay and a good home for our 2 children. We are familiar with the Hood River area and knew we would be staying in a pretty busy area, our only complaint would be lots of traffic (could not be heard from inside, only when outside) and not a great outdoor space, but that was fairly easy to work around. Alisha was very responsive through the trip.
Nicely appointed, clean and cozy place close to Hood River proper.. the beds are also very comfortable!
Great stay! Local coffee and bakery walking distance in the morning! Alisha was very responsive when we were in need of some batteries! Board games provided in the house made nights in fun for all!

This place looks just like the pictures with a beautiful view if you take one step outside the door! Quick access to the waterfront and lots of useful amenities. Very easy to find and a very easy checkout process! Could not say enough nice things about this place !
We had a great stay and would come back again. The AC kept us cool during a hot July and we enjoyed spending time in the backyard.
We greatly enjoyed our trip, and the accommodations were ideal for our family of four. We would definitely consider staying again in the future.
Alisha was a great host, and the house was perfect for our family. Would stay again.
Cute and cozy, super comfy beds and tastefully decorated. Alisha was a very responsive host. Location was great but on a busy intersection.
Great little house, very comfortable and nicely decorated
It was cute and clean.

We spent two nights at Alisha's place and can recommend it without a doubt!
Everything was very clean and perfectly equipped - we didn't miss a thing and we felt very much. In addition, Alisha is a very likeable host who is always available. We would come back at ☺️
Fantastic stay, clean and cozy with comfortable beds. We had everything we needed and more. Highly recommend.
Super cute place. Perfect for our family. Clean and cozy. Good communication. Highly recommend.
Super cute little house in a great area. Everything was easy and smooth. There's a really delicious bakery around the corner that we loved. Would definitely recommend!
Great spot in Hood River. Had everything we needed, it was comfortable and clean. We would definitely stay here again!

We had a fabulous stay at Alisha’s place. It was clean, just as described, and we are so thankful to have found a place for us to stay with our dog in Hood River. The location is close to many of our favorite spots and parking was easy. We would 100% recommend and hope to stay again in the future.
Really cute home, nice snacks and coffee and tea for us. Beds were really comfortable, nice strong shower. Perfect place for our girls' trip!
Super cute home near downtown hood river. Home was clean and stocked with everything you would need. Easiest check out ever and very reasonably priced
Lovely affordable 2 bedroom. Alisha was nice and responsive. Would happily return again.

The house was comfortable and well-equipped, with a coffee shop just across the street. Just a lovely little house and a very livable space - we felt right at home. Alisha was responsive and friendly, always helpful.
Comfortable, clean place with a lot of charm. Super quick drive into Hood River. Friendly host. We’d definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay at Alisha's place! The space was comfortable, spacious, and decorated to feel like home. The spot was a quick drive to the downtown area with restaurants and riverside walks. The place was well stocked and she even left us some tasty snacks! Alisha was easy to communicate with and responded quickly. We would definitely stay here again!
Laurie’s studio was perfect for our two night stay in Hood River. It was quiet , peaceful yet close to town . Loved the swing on the deck
We had a wonderful stay here while adventuring the Columbia River Gorge. The place was super cute and very clean. Bed was very comfortable. Would definitely stay again.

This ranks among the best places we've stayed. Great location and amazing surroundings. The accommodations are perfect for a couple's weekend getaway, or even a longer stay. We were talking about what we would improve, and there really isn't anything we'd change. When you go, I hope the weather cooperates so you can sit on the swing out on the deck. I don't remember if the listing mentions this, but you do have to climb a flight of outside stairs to get to the door. We had no trouble with this, but something to be aware of if you have mobility issues.
Lovely place with beautiful deck. Outside of town on a quiet street.
Wonderful studio! The big deck and open yard made it feel like you were on your own private farm.
Laurie's studio was absolutely lovely. It had everything we needed and was very comfortable, peaceful and quiet. We hope to stay here again.
A very comfortable stay on a gorgeous property just about Hood River.

This was a great location not far from anything but was quiet and a peaceful setting. Hosts were great with communication. The set up comfortable and had all we could ask for. Would reccomend and would stay here again.
Lovely and quiet stay! Thank you!
My dogs and I really enjoyed our stay, and the fenced yard was a wonderful surprise along with the local wildlife. Close to hiking areas and town. Would highly recommend.

My husband, 2 month old, dog, and I stayed at Laurie’s place for 2 nights. It was the perfect size for our little family and a great location for the activities we had planned while there. The property was beautiful and great for our dog to run around in the mornings / evenings. Laurie was very responsive and kind (even offered a pack -n- play for our baby). We would definitely stay here again!!
my wife, dog, and I really enjoyed our stay. Laurie's place is quiet and a wonderful place to stay. we've already shared with friends how much we enjoyed staying there.

Laurie’s home and yard are beautiful, large, green and located in a wonderful area of small farms , homes on acreage and orchards. The apartment we stayed in is in the back and up some stairs, which allowed for a lot of privacy when we wanted it. Laurie was very friendly and available and also gave us some good recommendations for hikes in the amazing Columbia River Gorge area. We would stay there again in the future if we go to the Hood River area again.

This is a great place to stay in Hood River. The place is clean, cozy, and has been thoughtfully stocked and decorated. We even found snacks waiting for us. The deck is surrounded by beautiful trees and a peaceful atmosphere. Laurie is very kind and helpful, but she’s also respectful of her guests’ privacy. We will definitely be back!

Laurie's place was so inviting, well appointed. In a serene location yet close to town and not far from some great hikes and waterfalls. This was the cleanest place I have ever stayed and the others were clean. Soft sheets and blankets. comfortable bed and a nice couch to relax on after a long day. This is a great place to stay and if we are in the area again we will stay at Laurie's.
We had a great time staying a few nights there with our dogs. They had a blast. Great people and great place! We will be back!

This was the perfect home base to explore the Hood River area! Not far from town, close to the gorge attractions and it was so homey inside. The space was so clean and better than it looked in the pics and I didn’t realize the fenced area is their entire property! Probably more than an acre for my dog to explore, she loved her time here. She is an apartment dog so didn’t get that kind of independence at home. Only complaint is the bed frame is verrrrry squeaky and did wake me up a couple times during my stay. Highly recommend this place!

Laurie was an exceptional host, always available if we had questions. The quiet and serene studio located up a flight of outdoor stairs had gorgeous views of the farm and surrounding pines. The studio was impeccably decorated with inspiring paintings of Mount Hood and Mount Adams. The layout of the studio was exactly what we wanted: a pleasant and roomy living/sitting area with a large screen, a full kitchen with dishes amply supplied, a lovely table for dining, a sense of privacy for sleeping located right around the corner, with beautiful linens and comfy blankets, and the bed was THE MOST COMFORTABLE BED I have ever slept in. We got the best rest, peace, and restoration ever! We are walkers and thoroughly enjoyed the walk into town with Mount Adam on the left and Mount Hood on the right. Nothing could have been better than the hospitality we received! We definitely hope to stay here again on our next trip to visit the grandchildren. Thanks so much, Laurie, for all!

Cozy studio in a country setting yet, close enough to hiking and town with a myriad of activities. Laurie was very friendly and a wonderful host. The studio was warm and lovely. Would definitely stay again. My dog and I lived meeting her “grandog”.
Great, simple place to stay just outside of Hood River. Peaceful and great surroundings with friendly hosts. Would stay again!
Peaceful place to see 10 minutes from Hood River city center. Friendly host. Nice living space, clean, Netflix, great deck and plenty of space.

This was an awesome place to stay a couple of days. Laurie was very helpful and responsive to needs. The space is clean and comfortable. The outdoor setting is just beautiful. It is private, quiet, and had lovely little touches to make us feel at home.
Comfortable and beautiful setting

We had a fabulous stay. The property is large, and the dogs had a fantastic time exploring and running around. Lots of new smells and large area to run. Inside we were comfortable with all amenities needed. The bed was comfortable, on the softer side, but not too soft. Laurie's place is a quick and easy drive into town. Laurie was a great host, always very responsive.

What a gem! The location was quiet, peaceful, and easy to find. You can see that Laurie goes to extra mile to ensure her guests' comfort: healthy welcome treats, COFFEE and teas, a first aid kit, an impeccably clean studio and the most comfortable bed and bedding! Another bonus was the spacious parking area. This was a great value and we'd definitely stay again.
I am so glad my pup and I chose Laurie’s place to stay during our time in Hood River! It was the perfect place to call home while we explored the Columbia River gorge!

It was a great choice to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable. The place was nice and cozy, and Laurie was communicative, responsive, and patient. When I asked her a question in the night, although the answer was clearly written in the instructions on the table and I bypassed it , she responded right away pleasantly.
Comfortable, quiet neighborhood, looked just like the pictures. Thanks.
Really enjoyed our stay in the Oregon Countryside.

This truly was a great surprise spot, it was tucked away, but close to town and very quiet and peaceful. We were there to discover the area but the studio was so inviting it was difficult to leave. Evenings out on the deck were spectacular, very calm and peaceful. The interior was well laid out and thoughtful. We brought a dog, and we all had plenty of space. We intend to rent this studio again when it's available, and we are in the area.
Such a nice peaceful place. Relaxing and enjoyable. Highly recommend!
I highly recommend staying here with Laurie. We will be coming back again. Beautiful location and very quiet. You won’t be disappointed!

Thank you for the wonderful stay! Check-in was seamless and Laurie was flexible with us arriving a little bit later. Plenty of space for our little pups to run and very pretty gardens in the back. We had a peaceful and quiet time - which is just what we wanted.
Laurie's farm studio was peaceful and comfortable. It was easy to communicate with the hosts and the instructions were helpful and accurate.

Laurie was a great host, very communicative and helpful. She lives in a beautiful area and we really enjoyed having a glass of wine on the deck with the pretty view. I’d love to come back here in the Fall. Definitely recommend.
Lovely apartment, very responsive host. Wonderful place. Will come again!
Comfortable stay. Temps were 107 in Hood River but Laurie had AC and an additional fan to make sleeping ok. Overhead fan was not functioning but not necessary.
Very nice and quiet place. Laurie was very helpful and friendly. Cozy and clean with all the necessary amenities.
A great peaceful place. We loved it. We were able to meet Laurie when we arrived. She was very nice and welcoming. We would return without hesitation.
Iwill definitely try to stay here next year!
Lovely and peaceful place. A very friendly couple!
Lovely place, wonderful hosts. Highly recommended!

We found Laurie to be so helpful, but never intrusive. The space is exactly what you see and what is described, and it's very pleasant. The yard outside is so nice - it's beautiful and relaxing to sit on the deck.
Wonderful, peaceful, location. Laurie was very kind and great communication. Would definitely stay again.
Very lovely and peaceful place!

Laurie and Terry were excellent hosts, and their property is beautiful. It's slightly off the beaten track, but the directions for finding it were extremely easy to follow and our check-in was a breeze. The view from the deck was incredibly peaceful and is a great place to enjoy a cup of coffee or a glass of wine. Location offers quick access to downtown and all the good mountain bike trails.

Laurie's place is a little haven away from the hustle of town. The guesthouse is quiet and comfortable, lovely senary, and peaceful; the perfect place to come "home" to after an adventurous day. The location is not too far from anything you want to do in the area. Laurie is very friendly and accommodating. We would stay here again and again.

We had a lovey stay at Laurie and Terry’s Airbnb. It was a quiet oasis. The accommodations were very clean, comfortable and well done. Laurie and Terry were both very helpful and welcoming. We highly recommend staying here!
Loved the place and loved the area. Laurie was a great hostess!

Great peaceful place, about 10 minutes from downtown hood river
Great, mostly fenced back yard.
Laurie was a great host!

Great home base for visiting Hood River! We loved the access to Post Canyon for mtn biking as well as restaurants and shops in the heart of Hood River! It was nice to come back to a serene cozy place in between the fun.
Very clean and comfy

We had a great time at Laurie and Terrys! It was the perfect spot for us for an event nearby. They’re located just ten minutes from the winery and 30-60 minutes from incredible hikes around Mt. Hood, and everywhere you look is picturesque.
We had everything we needed and the room was nice and secluded with a private entrance that was easy to figure out. We appreciated the communication and help prior to our arrival and during our stay. Would definitely visit again!

Thank you Laurie for being such a great host. We really appreciated your friendliness and helpfulness, yet giving us lots of opportunity to come and go and be on our own. We especially appreciated the peacefulness and really loved walking and jogging on the uncrowded (so few cars!) streets through the rows and rows of blossoming orchards and lovely view of the mountain just up a few streets!
my favorite place to stay when visiting the Columbia River Gorge Area. Hosts are great.

Laurie and Terry were excellent hosts for our extended stay at the apartment. The apartment was equipped with everything we needed, has great natural light, and the surrounding area is just so peaceful! Great home base for skiing and getting into downtown Hood River easily. Also, our dog loved the massive backyard!
This was a beautiful and peaceful stay! Very clear and detailed instructions to get there and it was so clean!!
Great space for a couple with a dog. Easy check-in and parking situation. Comfortable bed and couch. Large yard with lots for the dog to sniff.
Laurie's sanctuary is heaven on Earth.

We loved our stay with Laurie and Terry! Their place was just as advertised, a little bit outside of town but a very easy drive to all the shops and restaurants. Their property is incredibly beautiful and and we really enjoyed the peace and quite. We will definitely stay with Laurie and Terry again next time we’re in Hood River!

My cousin and I were very comfortable for our week in this well equipped, very clean, and conveniently located unit. We liked the shower and the bed was comfortable. The description was quite accurate. We were there at a time of cooler nights and found the heating system really worked well. The place is attractive and in a lovely country setting. The porch is very inviting and Laurie is a welcoming and responsive hostess. I would happily stay here again.
This location is beautiful and Laurie is a great host. We stayed for a whole week and we were comfortable. I would stay again if the opportunity comes up.

Lovely little place near town. Laurie’s property is beautiful and everything was clean and tidy. We enjoyed a drink on the patio porch swing before heading out for the evening and it was picture perfect!

Nice and quiet setting with some forest around it, but closer to town. There were even some deer in the meadow this morning!
The space is convenient, there is a small fridge, microwave and enough in the kitchen to heat up food for yourself. There is a hot plate in the cupboard but we did not need to use it. Nice shower, comfortable bed and a couch that is suitable to sleep on. And Netflix! If I had brought my dog there would be plenty of room out in the gated yard for them to walk around etc. but there is wildlife, so they need some monitoring. It is ez entrance with keypad and space for parking.
Great place to stay.

In the past I have chosen a downtown location thinking that might be more convenient. Now I know that
staying only a few minutes out of town on a farm is the way to go. The setting here is spectacular and very quiet. What a pleasant experience to end the day out on a private deck while sitting on a swing looking at a beautiful grove of very tall pines.

We really lucked out with Laurie's Airbnb! It was such a beautiful time of the year, and I am SO thankful that we scores big with Laurie's Airbnb! My family and I were unbelievably comfortable during our entire stay, and we had everything we needed. Our 14-month old daughter enjoyed it just as much too! She loved running around the backyard, climbing the rocks, and playing on the slide! We are truly grateful for Laurie's hospitality, and we hope for the opportunity to stay at her Airbnb again.
Hands down the best hosts I have ever had! Laurie and her husband Terry were amazing and very accommodating. Will definitely be back!
We had an excellent stay and would definitely return. Awesome hosts, comfortable accommodations, and great location!
Really comfortable and quiet! Would happily return.
A cozy space in a rural area that was just a few miles from the waterfront and other Hood River sights. My one regret is not seeing any chickens in the yard so guess we have to go back.

Wonderful hosts. Good communication and easy check in. The place is cozy, peaceful, clean and the bed is very comfy. The deck and swing are perfect for stargazing and coffee in the morning. We enjoyed our stay!

it's a great find. no matter what you do in hood river, you can just come here and stay the night. this place is conveniently placed to enjoy the nature and is pretty close to downtown by car. Their backyard to so quiet and peaceful that you just don't feel like going out if you love the calm. I would definitely come back here the next time I'm in oregon.

Amazing little slice of paradise that is close to all amenities and 10 mins from the Kiteboarding zone. Very quiet and relaxing setting.
Also very close to Mtn Biking - literally in the back yard.
Thanks for an amazing stay, and we hope to be back soon!!
Beautiful spot. Lots of thoughtful touches and very accommodating host. Would definitely recommend!

This place is exactly everything an Air BnB should be! Clean, nicely designed space perfect for 1 or 2 people to stay comfortably, clear check in instructions and a beautiful nature view to enjoy during your stay. I stayed here just for a place to crash after a friend's wedding but I wish I could have booked a longer stay to rest, relax, and enjoy the beautiful porch and backyard view more! Laurie was really easy to communicate with and very helpful. Would highly recommend this place! It's an Air BnB gem!
Wonderful stay. Loved the area. Spacious and quiet.

We were attending a wedding in Hood River and needed a spot that could accommodate our family with three kids under four. Happy to report that two pack n plays easily fit. Our kids loved the backyard and appreciated the toys the hosts shared. We’ll definitely stay again.
Such a quiet and private place to enjoy the trees and wildlife, but still 10 minutes to the breweries downtown. A perfect place to stop for the night on our way to the coast!

Was a great location for our visit. Very serene environment. Felt wonderful to sit on the deck in the cool mornings. Very happy with the accommodations. Perfect size for 2 adults. Would definitely stay there again. Finally saw the chickens roaming on Saturday!!

perfect getaway with great hosts. close enough to hood river and other activities but so peaceful to return as a home base. our puppy enjoyed it to! hope to return when we are back in the area. thanks so much!
Lovely, peaceful, quiet, and convenient location. We really enjoyed having coffee on the porch. Close to beautiful orchards, hiking, and plenty to do in Hood River.
What a fantastic place. We loved the greenery, the chickens, the private deck. My friend and I had a lovely stay and hope to return someday.
Low key studio, well described in the listing, and the hosts were accommodating and nice. Great location for being a little bit out of town. Would visit again.
We loved our stay. Laurie and Terry were very kind/ the unit is very private/safe/quiet and gorgeous. Parking is a breeze. Mattress on the bed is very soft.
outstanding place! hosts were amazing. highly recommend.

I really enjoyed my stay here! It was my first time in Hood River and it was the perfect setting for the type of solo bike touring travel that I do. Very quiet and not from the downtown area. Everything went smoothly and I recommend this place!
10/10 would stay here again!! Amazing place.
Wonderful stay!
Great location, quiet, nice deck to sit and enjoy the scenery.
Great place to stay while in hood river. The rental space provides all the essentials and has a lovely porch looking over the backyard.

We loved this space for our brief visit to Hood River while attending a wedding. Very quiet and peaceful and just a short drive to downtown Hood River. Comfy bed, clean space, loved seeing the chickens and the sweet backyard!
It is a perfect little guest house with everything one needs for a cosy night. Our dog especially appreciated the big fenced yard so she could stretch after a day in the car.

The studio exceeded all of our expectations. The grounds were beautiful and the studio was perfect for my family, including my 8-month-old son and two dogs. Laurie even provided a dog bed and treats. She really anticipated what guests may need, including providing well-positioned nightlights. The studio was incredibly clean, comfortable, and located close to both the town and the mountain bike park - we would definitely stay again.
The backyard is super beautiful with giant old growth trees lining a beautiful meadow. Everything was super clean. So peaceful and quiet and 5 minutes to town.
A quiet place with great value.

We absolutely enjoyed our stay at the Sunset Farm Studio. The peaceful farm setting was perfect for decompressing from a busy week. The small studio provided an ideal space for my spouse, our little dog, a bike, and myself on our weekend getaway in Hood River. Our puppy was in heaven in the backyard area. We got to play fetch and smell all the smells while soaking up the sunshine. A big thanks to Laurie and her husband for allowing well-behaved dogs. They were great hosts. They had clear and fast communication, allowed us to check in early, and ensured the studio had everything we needed for our long weekend.
The Sunset Studio was a perfect landing spot for our weekend adventure! It was so cozy and bright and had everything we needed for preparing for the day. Loved staying in this country paradise!

This was my second time staying here with a friend and we had a great time! Very comfy studio with everything you need for a getaway weekend to the beautiful Hood River valley. Very quiet and peaceful area and a good home base for exploring Hood River and the surrounding farmlands!

Cute little place about 10-15 min from Hood River. We stayed here during a freak snow storm and Laurie shoveled our car out of the snow and offered to feed us breakfast. Very hospitable and great experience, would stay again.
We have stayed here many times. It is perfect place for MTB riders like me and perfect hosts for all people. Thanks again!
The bed is really soft
Quiet and comfortable. Convenient to Hood River. The host has thought of everything to make a stay very nice.
Such a peaceful location and kind hosts. The studio was comfortable, clean, and had all the amenities I could hope for.
My 5 year old son and I enjoyed staying here! It was perfect spot to enjoy nature while still being close to town.
The hosts were very personable, the space had everything we needed and the ability to bring our dog and use their backyard was perfect.

Very nice and private place, nice owners, quiet and peaceful. We were allowed to let our dogs off leash in their large, fenced-in yard so they could play and get some energy out. Room was comfortable, clean and will consider this location again next time we're in Hood River!

This is a gem! My niece, doggo and I stayed two nights and found it as described and more! Very clean, cozy beds, hot shower, usefulq kitchenette, wonderful deck to sit out on to view the stars and for morning coffees. The yard was very nice to walk and for doggo to play ball. It was the best studio that I've stayed in so far - seriously. We skied at Timberline and Meadows and the drive was easy and pleasant. I highly recommend!

It was great to be on a second story because it gave a nice view of the big garden, yard, and forest edge from the porch. The neighbors yard is what looked like a vegetable farm so the setting is very peaceful. My dog thoroughly enjoyed the bed that had been set up for her by the hosts.

Laurie’s place provided a quiet and cozy retreat with a great atmosphere. The suite is comfortably furnished with a soft bed and sofa, kitchenette, and table/workspace. Working remotely from this location, I had no issues with Wi-Fi access. I also enjoyed walking the yard in the morning and saying hello to the chickens!

This place is such a cute studio that has exactly what you need for a getaway to Hood River! The host is very helpful and prompt with their answers to any questions or concerns that you might have during your stay.
Our stay at Laurie's place in Hood River was great! We loved the little patio and the bed was very comfortable. We would definitely stay again!

This little place was perfect for our family. Very clean, and nice comfortable cozy touches all over. Nice shampoo and conditioner, very soft blankets, and great little treats. We asked for hiking recommendations that were good for a family with small children and Laurie shared some trails that were PERFECT and very beautiful. Amazing place to stay and relax - We definitely plan on returning!

Laurie was very helpful in helping us navigate a late night arrival and tricky parking situation with my truck and trailer. The bed was very cozy! It was a comfy and welcome night’s rest. Check in was straight forward and clear. It was a lovely, pleasant experience
This is a wonderful place— clean, private, nicely decorated. It was a relaxing stay for my dogs and myself.

This is a beautiful place. The apartment is very clean, nicely decorated and comfortable. It was a great place for me and my pups to relax and enjoy the area. Laurie is a terrific host. I highly recommend staying here.
Awesome spot! Clean accommodations, quiet rural location but close enough to town for amenities, food, etc. Great host communication and would definitely book again.

Perfect size for two people, very quiet and dark - we slept so well! Heard coyotes our second night as we were stargazing. The apartment is equipped with a dog bed, which our pup enjoyed. We would definitely stay here again !

Great place for a long-term stay!! I ended up staying for an entire month and the studio unit was fully equipped with everything I needed. No small detail was overlooked in the setup and everything was super clean. Laurie even had a dog bed setup for my golden retriever (which he ended up lounging on every morning). If I ever come back to Hood River, I will definitely be staying here again. Thanks so much for your hospitality, Laurie and Terry. And for all of the snow shoveling :)

This time I came back with my wife and daughter. It is perfect as always, and we just loved this place. All kinds of personal touches to take care of their guest. Laurie is always quick to respond to any in all questions that I have. The huge amount of snow made it interesting but beautiful! The city plowed all the way to their driveway so there was no problem getting there. I'll be back this summer again to MTB Post Canyon! Thank you!
A great place to stay. Very friendly, helpful host.
very friendly couple. this was a perfect place and if I ever need to stay in the area it'll be my 1st choice
Would definitely recommend staying at the farm. Beautiful setting, close to Hood River, very clean and thoughtful stay. Thanks Laurie!
Such a perfect weekend getaway! Was minutes from several vineyards we visited and from downtown. Host was great and attentive! Studio had nice touches to make guests feel right at home!
Nice little clean place with a great yard for doggies. This little studio is about a 5 minute drive from downtown and it's nice and clean.
The studio was very nice, clean and hosts were quick to respond. We had a great stay.

The studio is clean and cozy, and the hosts had great communication before and during the stay. Their property is beautiful and just a quick drive from Hood River's downtown. I would recommend this studio and would stay again.
Nice little space on a farm really close to Hood river.
Cozy and peaceful within a short drive of the downtown. It was a perfect weekend getaway
Very thoughtful and kind upon arrival. Left me to sleep between work days. Considerate. Very clean and thoughtful space. Was grateful to find them and their studio.

Lovely setting in the country, very clean, comfortable and cozy along along with the 'dog friendly' Exceptional hosts!
Will be wonderful with the fireplace this fall!

Nice spot away in the highlands away from the town and with a great view of the surrounding forest. Beautiful deck and well stocked for a studio, also close to the Family Man Staging Area for biking. Great place to stay, hosts were respectful, and will be looking for this listing for next time!

Laurie and Roger were very friendly and welcoming during our stay. Before arriving they gave us a heads up that they were in the middle of construction on the front of their place. This did not disrupt our stay in any way. All the amenities were provided and the location was perfect. It was wonderful to bring our dog along and for a large property to walk around on.

Fantastic stay. The room had everything that we needed to be comfortable and the location was convenient for Hood River and local activities like apple picking. The back yard was wonderful for walking and seeing the chicken coop. We would definitely stay again!

Laurie’s was the perfect place for my family of 4 to stop and rest after we flew into Portland for a family road trip into California. It’s clean, comfortable, and relaxing. It has all the essentials that you need and is close to town so you can pick up dinner, etc. My 10 year old love playing in her backyard, looking at the chickens and picking raspberries!
Great little spot!! Thought it would be a little closer to downtown Hood River but overall really cozy and clean :)
This upstairs semi-studio is nicely appointed. The bed is very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay and would be pleased to return.
Really lovely, cozy spot tucked away near Hood River. Would love to return someday!
This guest suite is very comfortable! You can enjoy a comfy couch, hot shower, coffee & tea, and fresh air on the balcony.

Laurie’s place was wonderful! It’s very peaceful and in a beautiful location. The apartment has a fantastic deck that overlooks the large property — a highlight for sure. It was very clean, comfortable and well-equipped. We would love to come back and stay again!
Wonderful Airbnb - spacious, quiet and extremely clean!

Laurie's Airbnb could not be better. It's located on a lush, green property with a beautiful view of trees. The studio was impeccably clean, felt very spacious, and had great amenities (such as coffee, tea, and snacks included). The surrounding area is very quiet and dark at night -- perfect for a great night's rest. Laurie was very communicative and made sure we had everything we needed. If we ever come back to Hood River area, we will absolutely stay here again!

Great place to stay! Laurie provided great instructions and the place was exactly as described. The bathroom is stocked with helpful items if you forget any of your toiletries, and the place has everything we needed for our one night stay in Hood River. Highly recommend!

Very beautiful, cozy studio room with everything one would need to explore Hood River. Convenient location, tucked away on a peaceful farm, with friendly and communicative hosts who give you your privacy. Would recommend!

Nice studio space with a great deck and an amazing backyard just a few minutes outside of Hood River proper. Better than advertised. I'd recommend staying here, especially if you have a well-behaved dog that would enjoy the large fenced-in property.
We will definitely be back. This cottage is just beautiful. Bigger than I expected. Super clean and such attention to detail. Plus lots of open space for the kids to run and play.
Laurie's place was clean, tranquil and conveniently close to mountain bike trails. Our little dog enjoyed the large back yard,
Very comfortable setting. Especially good for a couple. If it hadn’t been so hot we could have enjoyed a pleasant deck.
Laurie was so kind and easy to get in touch with prior to and during our visit. The studio was clean and homey with a beautiful view of the backyard and minutes from downtown Hood River.
Small but very comfortable place in a very quiet and private location.

Laurie's place is absolutely adorable, perfectly clean and comfortable, and had all the amenities we needed. Laurie was an exceptional host and was incredibly communicative and sweet. We will absolutely stay again next time we are in Hood River!

Perfect launch site for your Gorge life. You’re minutes from the Heights, downtown, & 2 min. from Post Canyon staging area. The Sunset Farm Studio is spacious, has ample parking & has all the amenities you need. The bathroom is private & separated from the living space by a small hallway. The unit is well equipped with dishes, toaster, microwave, Mr. Coffee maker, electric tea kettle & hot plate. The unit is well accommodating for 3 people & the blow up air mattress is quality. The large yard & dog loving hosts are perfect for your pooch (no chasing the chickens). We enjoyed having dinner on the porch while the sun went down behind the large pines & swaying on the swing while star gazing at night. Thank you to the hosts & the studio for giving us the best summer vacation.

A very nice value in a reasonable, private, location. Very peaceful setting. The deck is wonderful. We had great sight seeing nearby of the Columbia River Valley and Hood River area. Within one day we hiked to 11 waterfalls, and certainly could have done more! The area is both beautiful and historic, and we’ll worth the trip. Thanks, Laurie, for sharing your special part of the world!

What a great place soooooooo close to Post Canyon. We had an excellent time. This couple really knows how to make you feel at home and their cozy loft reflects it. The owners are amazing and friendly, they were there when we arrive to say hello and get us settled. What a pleasure sitting out on the deck in the evening overlooking their amazing place. They even gave us a shuttle to the top Post Canyon the day we arrived (Thank you Terry!). We will be back again because it is great place for my wife to relax with a good book while I rip it up at Post Canyon. No need to drive to Post, just a short pavement ride to the loft.
Great peaceful place to stay in Oregon. Easy drive to Hood River and quick drive to Mt Hood.
Nice apartment. Cozy, comfortable & clean. Lovely little backyard. Hosts were very friendly too.
Very relaxing place and perfect distance away from downtown and the wineries. Def would stay again!

Laurie’s space is like an elevated eagle’s nest that looks out over gardens, trees, and pasture. There is an easy outdoor stairway (handrails, yes!) to access first the deck with a swing and then the cozy, well-equipped studio: clean, comfy and attractive. Laurie’s space even thoughtfully supplied two spaces to leave a suitcase open, an amenity that we always appreciate! When you’re in Hood River, be sure to stay there.
This location is outside of the activity center, but still close to downtown. It’s quiet and a good place for walks in a rural setting. Lovely.

This is a great place to stay for a weekend getaway! Very beautiful and peaceful out in the country but very close to Hood River too. The studio is comfortable and has everything you need as well as a lovely patio to enjoy the beautiful surroundings.

We had an absolutely amazing stay here! Laurie and her husband were so welcoming to us and our two doggos and the studio and back yard were great. This studio definitely made our stay in Hood River even better, and the area around the AirBnb was fun to explore on our runs. They had great recommendations for trails to try and different hikes in the area. 10/10 recommend!

Laurie’s place is very relaxing. At night you can hear frogs and during the day there are chickens running around in the big backyard. It is close to farmland and vineyards. If you have a dog you do have to keep it on a leash while in the backyard so it doesn’t chase the chickens!
Also close to a beautiful winery that was 4 miles away.

Lovely place to stay just outside the beautiful town of Hood River. This is actually right next to an organic farm about 5-10 min drive outside of town; the drives into town are beautiful and not stressful at all ; so don’t let that be a barrier. It is so quiet and peaceful and the host was a lovely person . It is a quiet space and we were there in cool early spring and found the space warm and cozy. Minimal kitchen supplies so if you were planning on cooking meals not enough space or supplies are available; but there is enough that you can avoid eating all your meals out ; which is also very nice .

If you are looking for the perfect nest for your stay in Hood River, look no further. Laurie and her beautiful Airbnb was everything I needed to get away from the city for my 9 year anniversary! The peaceful, quiet country setting was lovely and it was a very short drive into the town itself. I instantly felt so comfortable and relaxed when we arrived there. Everything is so clean and organized with high quality blankets and towels; it was truly luxurious! The bench swing out front is the perfect touch to enjoy the forested back yard and deer met us in the morning before we left. Highly recommend Laurie's place. 💎
Very charming place. I loved it
Laurie was so helpful with recommendations for wine and beer tasting. It was so quiet and peaceful and relaxing.
So quiet and charming. It’s your own place on the farm and minutes from all things HR.
Lovely space with a great big yard and beautiful cedar trees!
Very lovely place! Would book again
A great and simple stay! Clean and private and the hosts were very accommodating.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Laurie's airbnb for about 10 days and enjoyed every minute! The bed is comfortable, the space is very comfortable for 2 people, the kitchenette is just enough. We so enjoyed our stay in Hood River, with the quick 8 minute drive into town, and the peaceful setting of this airbnb.
We had zero issues during our stay, and Laurie and her husband were perfectly accommodating! Easy parking, close to the mountains and gorge for skiing/hiking. Lots of great restaurants in town. The place was very very clean, which made us comfortable through our travels.
We will definitely be back!
For anyone traveling while working, the wifi was more than enough for me to do my fully online job, but if your job requires cell phone service Verizon wasn't super strong, but strong enough with wifi support!
A perfect base from which to explore Hood River and Mt. Hood. Very simple and clean. And on a lovely property.

Laurie's place is clean, cute and the hostess if very accommodating. When I told her I love fresh eggs, she even brought me some from her chickens on the farm. I couldn't have asked for a better experience.
Host was really helpful with all the things. Nice clean space in a beautiful area. Would stay again for sure.
Cute very small little mother in law suite. Nice touches and unique atmosphere

This place was great! It was very cozy, and just a quick drive into Hood River. It was easy to find and Laurie was a great host.
The space is up a set of stairs.
An enchanting, cozy space that the listing doesn’t do justice to. Super clean and organized.
Laurie was very responsive, and her place was very comfortable, peaceful and had everything we needed for a relaxing weekend away. My daughters loved looking at her very friendly chickens.
Perfect vacation getaway!
Great place to stay near Hood River!
the space was very comfy&location was easy to find & close to the main part of town. Our dog loved the backyard & chickens. This was perfect for our spontaneous girlstrip!

We enjoyed our peaceful stay at the quiet studio tucked away on Laurie’s property. It was clean, cozy, and offered all the amenities promised, and more. We brought our two little Shiba Inus with us, and there was a dog bed, a bag of duck/pumpkin treats, and a water dish for them. The place was cozy and comfortable, and very quiet being outside the town center and near popular mountain biking trails. Laurie was immediately responsive for our questions via text. It snowed the morning we were checking out and Laurie was there to shovel and salt the stair and deck, at an appropriate time, not too early. We will be coming back and highly recommend staying at the studio, and greeting her free range chickens too. :-)
Beautiful place. The grounds were awesome. A little out of the way. But really cool and comfortable.
Comfortable, clean and cozy- we really enjoyed our weekend. Awesome location , really nice to be a bit out of town. And the yard/ farm-like feel is lovely.
Exactly as pictured and described. Great place!
Laurie's place was just what I needed. Quiet and cozy. A very comfortable stay indeed.

The place is so cute and cozy! The couch was comfortable to sleep, about the same as the bed, and there were enough pillows and blankets. It was actually bigger than I expected. Small and cute, the heaters are sufficient. They have small sample size shampoos/conditioners, shower gel was a rare find though so maybe bring body wash/soap. Very nice and responsive house :)
Really cute place on gorgeous property.
Darling place! Spacious, lovely, and peaceful.
Cozy, quaint, quiet and peaceful. What more could you want?

Laurie has a beautiful and peaceful property, feels rural but only a few minutes from town. Nice touches like ice in the freezer, extra toiletries, extra blankets. Kitchenette was very useful for making basic breakfasts etc. We had a lovely stay.

Very peaceful, clean space, I was super
Impressed!
Laurie was an awesome host and the place was exactly as described, peaceful, beautiful and cozy. We would definitely stay here again!

This apt is just right for two or three guests and your good dog. Hosts communicate well, very friendly. Nice deck, great location in the woods, simple amenities but no range; m/w and mini frig are there. Beds comfy! When you don’t need much space and plan to spend most of your time elsewhere, this is perfect for sleeping and showering. An enjoyable drive back into town, too!

We only stayed one night, but everything was great. Laurie’s communication was excellent, and she kindly accommodated our last-minute reservation request. Her place is clean, comfortable, and pet-friendly, and the location is perfect for visiting the local wineries.
Amazing beautiful space!
Nice quiet location, with great access to Hood River and the Gorge.

A nice, comfortable private retreat.I loved my stay in laurie's place. Very spacious and easy to relax in. Laurie was responsive and helpful with recommendations for restaurants in Hood River (about a ten minute drive away). I wanted around her small farm (big backyard) accompanied by her friendly old dog.
Great location close to the town of Hood River and hiking at Mt. Hood. Very clean and comfortable. Loved the peaceful atmosphere.

A great place for quiet relaxation. Pleasant country location very close to Hood River, wineries and hiking trails. Inside was clean, spacious and very quiet. I recommend anyone arriving to do in daylight hours to be able to see where they're driving, and I would recommend the same for all ABNB rural stays. I would stay here again in a minute!
